Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: IDBI Bank at 6-month high; plans to enhance SWIFT monitoring
Subtitle: The bank has invited bids from system providers for implementation of two-factor authentication system with user identification to access SWIFT.
Content: ["Shares ofIDBI Bankextended gains to the fourth consecutive session and rose over 5.8% to six-month high of Rs74.90 on the lender's plan to boost its system for improved monitoring of access to SWIFT.The stock shrugged off weakness seen earlier today to surge upwards. The bank has invited bids from system providers for implementation of two-factor authentication system with user identification to access SWIFT, as per media reports.The move follows the RBI's mandate to banks to implement prescribed measures to strengthen the SWIFT operating environment in the wake of the recent $1.77-bln fraud reported at thePunjab National Bank.IDBI Bank Ltd is currently trading at Rs73.95 up by Rs3.6 or 5.12% from its previous closing of Rs70.35 on the BSE. The scrip opened at Rs70 and has touched a high and low of Rs74.90 and Rs69.50 respectively.\xa0The stock is currently trading above its 50 DMA.The banks loan book for Q2FY18 end stood at ~Rs1.83 lakh cr. The banks GNPA and NNPA for Q2FY18 stood at 24.98% and 16.06% respectively. The bank's Capital Adequacy Ratio is at 11.98% as of Q2FY18 end. The provision coverage ratio for Q2FY18 stood at 54.6%. Its credit cost for Q2FY18 stood at 278 bps. Its cost to income ratio for Q2FY18 is at 29.2%.IDBI bank is getting Rs10,600cr under PSU banks recapitalization programme for FY18 besides government has infused Rs1,861cr in Q2FY18. Also the bank is in the process of selling its non-core assets. These funds will allow the bank to provide for its bad loans and to maintain its regulatory capital. The bank expects its resolution of stressed assets by Q4FY18 and Q1FY19. We believe for next few quarters the banks bad loans provisioning would remain higher, which would dent its profitability. Its NIM is expected at ~2% for FY18E against ~1.7% reported in FY17."]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: European indices down on weak global cues, US Fed minutes
Subtitle: Investors were also circumspect ahead of the release of the minutes of the European Central Bank's monetary policy meeting on Jan 25 which will be released later today.
Content: ["Benchmark indices in Europe were down in trade on weak cues from their Asian peers and as the minutes of the US Federal Reserve's latest meeting, released Wednesday, raised further concern about rate hikes in the US.Investors were also circumspect ahead of the release of the minutes of the European Central Bank's monetary policy meeting on Jan 25 which will be released later today.At the time of filing, Germanys DAX was at 12,339, while UKs FTSE 100 was at 7,225 and Frances CAC-40 was at 5,257."]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: United Breweries gains, considers foray into craft beer market
Subtitle: UBL shrugged off the recent weakness and rose nearly 3% to a high of Rs1,064 on report that the company is planning to enter the lucrative craft beer market by the end of 2018
Content: ['Shares ofUnited Breweries(UBL) shrugged off the recent weakness and rose nearly 3% to a high of Rs1,064 on report that the company is planning to enter the lucrative craft beer market by the end of 2018 to tap into a growing base of consumers willing to pay a premium for the brew.All India Brewers Association pegs 20% on-year growth in the craft beer market, which is higher than 5-7% yoy growth in traditional beer market, as per a industry report.The company intends to capture significant market share in craft beer, which would add to the growth momentum of the company.UBL is currently trading at Rs1,048 up by Rs12.05 or 1.16% from its previous closing of Rs1,035.95 on the BSE. The scrip opened at Rs1,039.10 and has touched a high and low of Rs1,063.15 and Rs1,032.10 respectively. So far 1,60,045 (NSE+BSE) shares were traded on the counter.\xa0The stock is currently trading below its 50 DMA.UBL leads the Indian beer market with volume of more than 2x the size of the nearest competitor. The company has network of 21 own breweries and 8 contract breweries across the country. Its flagship brands are Kingfisher (regular and premium) and London Pilsner (economy). Further, with Heineken, UBL is present in the super premium category competing with strong international players like Corona, Stella Artois, etc.India is one of the fastest and underpenetrated beer markets in the world with per capita consumption of just 1.9 litres/annum vis-à-vis 35.9 litres in China. UBLs dominant position would help it continue to grow at a more rapid pace compared to global peers. Price hike in key states (in Q3FY18) coupled with differentiated and premium product launches would drive revenue CAGR of 15% with EBITDA margin expansion of ~250bps over FY17-19E. Further, we expect D/E at 0.1x in FY20E and PAT CAGR of 37% over FY17-20E.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Soybean trades flat on supply concerns, slack buying
Subtitle: Soybean on the National Commodity & Derivative Exchange (NCDEX) traded flat in afternoon session due to increasing arrivals in spot market and slack demand in local mandis.
Content: ['Soybean on the National Commodity & Derivative Exchange (NCDEX) traded flat in afternoon session Thursday due to increasing arrivals in spot market and slack demand in local mandis.Prices of bean were up as supply worries in global market along with lower output in domestic market kept prices up. Soybean daily arrivals are ruling below to 170,000 bags across India and likely to fall further due to off-season. Another factor that led to the increase was speculation that dry weather in Argentina may damage crops by around 30-40%.However, sharp gain in the prices was capped by weak demand in global market. Increasing disparity in prices of Indian soymeal in export market kept soybean demand down.Meanwhile, export inspections totalled at 960,066 tonnes during the week that ended Feb 15, down 29.3% from the week prior and 12.14% lower than the same week in 2017, data showed.Soybean for March delivery rose 0.05% to Rs 3,765 per quintal on the NCDEX.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Gitanjali Gems at lifetime low; SEBI may probe old case
Subtitle: SEBI is again looking into the case with Choksi coming under the spotlight following the Punjab National Bank fraud case.
Content: ['Shares ofGitanjali Gemshit a lifetime low today and were locked in the 5% lower circuit following reports that the Securities and Exchange Board of India revived an old case against the company and its promoter Mehul Choksi for allegedly manipulating trade.SEBI had issued a show cause notice to Choksi and 22 entities in March 2017. The regulator had asked the investigating team to complete the probe within six months, but it has not been done yet.SEBI is again looking into the case with Choksi coming under the spotlight following the Punjab National Bank fraud case.Gitanjali Gems Ltd is currently trading at Rs26.10 down by Rs1.35 or 4.92% from its previous closing of Rs27.45 on the BSE.The scrip opened at Rs26.10 and has touched a high and low of Rs26.10 and Rs26.10 respectively. So far 42,403 (NSE+BSE) shares were traded on the counter. The current market cap of the company is Rs325.60cr.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Biocon up; Malaysia unit Form 483 to not hit launch of insulin glargine
Subtitle: Insuling glargine is manufactured at the Malaysia unit and is awaiting approval from the USFDA.
Content: ["Shares ofBioconsurged 6% so far today as analysts believe that the Form 483 for the company's Malaysia unit by the US Food and Drug Administration may not delay the launch of insulin glargine biosimilar in the US.Insulin glargine is manufactured at the Malaysia unit and is awaiting approval from the USFDA. On Wednesday, Biocon said its Malaysia unit has received six observations from the US drug regulator.The issues related to US patent of Sanofi's Lantus, the branded version of insulin glargine, mean the company cannot launch the drug before 2019, thereby, giving them enough time to resolve issues with the US FDA, an analyst said.Biocon Ltd is currently trading at Rs612.15 up by Rs30.45 or 5.23% from its previous closing of Rs581.70 on the BSE.The scrip opened at Rs581 and has touched a high and low of Rs614.50 and Rs576.95 respectively. So far 94,91,062 (NSE+BSE) shares were traded on the counter. The current market cap of the company is Rs34,902cr."]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Reliance Infrastructure bags Rs3,647 cr EPC order
Subtitle: The contract entails design, engineering, supply, erection, testing and commissioning of BoP package and allied civil works on EPC basis.
Content: ['Reliance Infrastructure Limited has won a prestigious engineering, procurement and construction (EPC) contract for Rs3,647cr from Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation Limited (TANGEDCO) for balance of plant (BoP) package and allied civil works for 2 x 800 MW supercritical coal-based Uppur Thermal Power Project at Ramanathapuram District in Tamil Nadu.The contract entails design, engineering, supply, erection, testing and commissioning of BoP package and allied civil works on EPC basis. The project is to be commissioned in 36 months. EPC division of the infrastructure major has won the contract in International Competitive Bidding amidst competition from leading EPC players like BHEL, L&T, Tata Projects and BGR. With this contract, Reliance Infrastructure Limiteds EPC order book now stands at over Rs15,000cr.With a clear focus to position itself in Indias growing infrastructure sector, and a multitude of projects in the offing in areas as diverse as power, metro rails, nuclear power plants, air quality control, marine, railways, ports, and mega infrastructure projects, Reliance Infrastructure Limited is targeting EPC opportunities worth Rs2 lakh cr and increase the EPC order book to Rs50,000cr by FY19.Speaking on the occasion, Arun Gupta, CEO, Reliance Infrastructure Limited EPC, said, This is a prestigious project for us and will add to our existing credentials of executing large, complex projects in record time and at competitive cost. We will leverage our experience of execution of different types of power projects, from supercritical coal fired to advanced class gas turbine to renewable energy, in execution of this project and add\xa0TANGEDCO to our list of illustrious clients.In recent past, Reliance Infrastructure Limited has secured multiple EPC orders in power sector including 2 x 250 MW lignite based CFBC Thermal Power Project from NLC India Limited, Flue Gas Desulphurization works of 3 x 500 MW power plant from NTPC Limited and 750 MW Combined Cycle Power Plant along with a 500 MMSCFD Floating Storage Re-gasification Unit based integrated LNG terminal project in Bangladesh.In addition to power sector projects, Reliance Infrastructure Limited has won three road projects from NHAI, totaling 207km. Reliance Infrastructure Limited EPC division has earlier executed large projects worth Rs33,000cr ($5bn) including the 3,960 MW Ultra Mega Power Project at Sasan, Madhya Pradesh. Reliance Infrastructure Limited EPC is known for its unmatched capability in executing challenging projects, through a right mix of innovation, technology and robust processes to manage cost, time and delivering world-class quality.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Bonds hit fresh lows post release of MPC minutes
Subtitle: Market participants have perceived both minutes of FOMC and MPC to be hawkish. FOMC has suggested that US economy can withstand rate hikes.
Content: ['In the last week, the yields have hit 2 year highs, reflecting the weak sentiments and selling pressure. Overall, there has been less domestic demand at current yields, the recent state bond auction were set at higher yields than expected which further created pressure on central government securities.In addition, to the lack of domestic demand, global factors have added to the pressure.Market participants have perceived both minutes of FOMC and MPC to be hawkish. FOMC has suggested that US economy can withstand rate hikes. The US 10-year bond yield rose to 2.96%.On the domestic front, minutes of the Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) showed that most members are concerned about rising inflation pressures.RBI Governor Urjit Patel, in his statement noted that inflation is getting generalized, but also added that the nascent growth recovery needs to be supported.The 10 year bond yields rose to 7.82% today against its previous close of 7.71% on Wednesday.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Declining Channel breakout for Cyient, indicates a BUY
Subtitle: The stock has also surpassed its short term moving averages. The relative strength index has also moved past the 60 mark, which further indicates that stock is likely to move higher from here on.
Content: ["Cyienthas been consolidating for the past four weeks during this phase the stock was seen gyrating between 640 and 590. However, finally the directionless phase has come to an end as Cyient has broken out from adeclining channel patternon the daily chart. The price outburst has also been accompanied with smart uptick in traded volumes.In addition, the stock has also surpassed its short term moving averages. The relative strength index has also moved past the 60 mark ,which further indicates that stock is likely to move higher from here on.On the weekly chart the stock is also in the process of forming aBullish Engulfing pattern.Yesterday, the company's board had approved reduction of non-residents' investment limit in the company to 49% from 100%.Cyient is an established player in engineering design services, data transformation, network & operations and analytics. Its segment mix in FY17 included aerospace & defence 36.7%, communication 17.6% and utilities & geospatial (U&G) ~16.8%.Consolidation of vendors/contracts in engineering services outsourcing space should benefit specialists like Cyient and aid revenue growth. Design-led-manufacturing (DLM) business of Cyient turned profitable at operating level in 2QFY18 and we expect gradual improvement in DLM margins going forward. Currently, Cyient is available at significant discount (39%) to similar mid-sized IT firm like L&T Technology Services Ltd. We believe that this discount is a bit steep considering similar revenue growth, converging margin gap between the two and higher PAT CAGR for Cyient over FY17-20E."]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: SSWL commissions new plant in Chennai; stock gains 2%
Subtitle: The plant is operating at 90% utilization for the month of February and expected to attain 100% utilization from April 2018 onward with firm order book from domestic and export customers.
Content: ['Steel Strips Wheels Limitedis commissioning of its Chennai Truck wheel plant from February 2018. This plant will add 1.2 mn wheels capacity to the already existing 1.8 mn wheels capacity for the Truck/Trailer segment of SSWL. The total capacity of truck wheel segment now stands at 3.0 mn wheels and with this SSWL will be the largest truck steel wheel maker in India.The plant is operating at 90% utilization for the month of February and expected to attain 100% utilization from April 2018 onwards with firm order book from domestic and export customers.The plant is strategically placed to help SSWL service customers in Southern region in India and being near to the Sea port will provide leverage for serving export customers as well. Supplies will be to all key OEMs in India i.e. Ashok Leyland, Daimler India, Tata Motors and several Truck/Trailer OEMs in Middle East, Europe and US.Steel Strips Wheels Ltd is currently trading at Rs1,003.45 up by Rs18.85 or 1.91% from its previous closing of Rs984.60 on the BSE.\xa0The scrip opened at Rs999.80 and has touched a high and low of Rs1,021 and Rs980.15 respectively. So far 17,235 (NSE+BSE) shares were traded on the counter.\xa0The stock is currently trading below its 50 DMA.']

Author: ['Business Wire ']
Title: The Russian Export Center Will Be Presenting Innovative Russian Solutions at the Mobile World Congress in Barcelona for the First Time
Subtitle: The Russian Export Center Will Be Presenting Innovative Russian Solutions at the Mobile World Congress in Barcelona for the First Time
Content: ['Business Wire IndiaTheRussian Export Centerwill be introducing home-grown, Russian technology at the2018 Mobile World Congress (MWC)in Barcelona for the first time. Seventeen Russian companies will showcase their unique, powerful and competitive solutions to a world audience from February 26thto March 1st, from the Russian Booth (Pavilion No. 6, booth 6H20 and 6I11).Information about Russian companies attending is available via the link below:https://drive.google.com/file/d/1pNZ5d8ZOSrC5Ltf_ro_oQVZoo2ylnWqY/viewA special business program is organized for the Russian booth, to create opportunities for Russian companies to enter the international market and non-Russian companies to promote their business in Russia.We would like to welcome media and attendees to special events at the Russian Export Center exposition including:- A special session with the leading Russian newspaper "Kommersant", titled "New business opportunities in the digital age" involving Russian and foreign experts (February 26).- A Russian Business Communication Day: the official opening of the Russian booth, a series of "elevator pitches", interviews with the leaders of participating companies, a cocktail party and B2B meetings (February 27).For more information and for accreditation to the Russian booth events, please contact the Press Center of the Russian exposition operator INCONNECT Group.JSC Russian Export Center(REC)  State Institute for Export Support, established with the support of the Government of the Russian Federation. The Center represents a "single window" (one-stop solution) for working with exporters in the field of financial and non-financial support measures, including cooperation with relevant ministries and agencies. To form a "one-stop solution" concept, the Export Insurance Agency of Russia (JSC EXIAR) and JSC ROSEXIMBANK were integrated into the Russian Export Center group. In the ordinary course of activities, REC provides a wide range of services to producers of non-resource products at all stages of export cycle, interacts with the relevant executive authorities, prepares proposals for improving the business environment in terms of exports and foreign trade, cooperates regularly with representatives of business and expert community, contributes to overcoming the barriers and removal of "systemic" restrictions. The detailed information is on website of the Russian Export Center:http://exportcenter.ruYou can find the following REC Group references in social networks:https://www.facebook.com/exportcenter.ru/?fref=tshttps://new.vk.com/exportcenterhttps://twitter.com/exportcenter_ruhttps://www.instagram.com/russian_export_centerView source version on businesswire.com:http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180221005633/en/']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Adani Enterprises to consider selling stake in Carmichael coal mine after funding delay
Subtitle: The company has stated that they would not meet the March deadline to arrange $2.3bn in funding for the Carmichael coal mine project
Content: ['According to media reports, Adani Enterprises Ltd has stated that they would not meet the March deadline to arrange for AUD 3bn (~Rs14,900cr) in funding for the project. In December 2017, the Queensland government had a plan to provide Adani Enterprises with AUD900mn in funding for a rail line to connect the mine to the which would have helped in bringing the mine to production by 2020. The management also stated that they are considering a stake sale in the Carmichael project, though no details were forthcoming.The delay in project funding is the latest issue with the Carmichael coal mine. The Carmichael coal mine has been facing opposition over the past few months from environmental groups as well as local residents in Australia. Earlier this year, The company had announced that they would be developing the project by themselves after cancelling a AUD2bn deal with mining contractor Downer EDI Ltd.These developments make it unlikely that the Carmichael coal mine would be operational by its 2020 timeline. However, the decision to sell a stake in the project indicates that a new investor would help to arrange for financing to bring the development of the mine back on track. The short term impact on the stock would be minimal, as this delay in funding was expected given the setbacks suffered over the past few months.Adani Enterprises is involved in the businesses of  coal mining & trading, city gas distribution, power generation and edible oils. The coal mining business, located across India, Australia and Indonesia produced 12mn MT in FY17. The solar power generation business, which has a capacity of 808MW, produced 787mn units of electricity in FY17 (11.1% utilization). The city gas distribution business grew 7% yoy to 408MMSCM. The edible oils business produced 2.08mn MT in FY17 against a capacity of 12,000 tonnne per day. The company also operates agri-storage business with a capacity of 8.5 lakh tonnes.We expect Adani to report revenue CAGR of 7.1% over FY17-19E aided by (a) ~7% CAGR in coal production volumes supported by strong domestic steel and thermal power production and (b) city gas distribution volumes to continue to grow at 7% CAGR due to user addition. EBITDA margins are likely to expand by 254bps over FY17-19E aided by higher volumes in the coal and city gas distribution businesses. The stock is currently trading at 16.4x FY19E EPS.Adani Enterprises Ltd is currently trading at Rs195.85 down by Rs1.2 or 0.61% from its previous closing of Rs197.05 on the BSE.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Idea Cellular raises Rs3,500cr through QIP at Rs82.5 per share
Subtitle: QIP concludes a two part equity raising plan totaling Rs6,750cr
Content: ['Idea Cellular Ltdhas raised Rs3,500cr through a qualified institutional placement (QIP) of 42.42cr shares at a rate of Rs82.5 per share. A few days back the Board of Directors had allotted 32.66cr shares to the promoters of Idea Cellular through a preferential allotment at a rate of Rs99.5 per share. This concludes a capital raising plan that saw a total of Rs6,750cr being raised to improve the companys balance sheet ahead of their merger with Vodafone.Idea Cellular had reported losses of Rs3,206cr for 9MFY18. These losses had raised Vodafones concerns over the merger with Idea Cellular. As per the merger agreement, the net debt-to-EBITDA of the new merged entity was not to exceed 6.5 times. However, Ideas losses in 9MFY18 pushed the merged entitys net debt-to-EBITDA to above 6.5 times, which raised concerns over the viability of the merger. The QIP and the preferential allotment help give Idea Cellular enough capital to keep the net debt-to-EBITDA below the crucial 6.5x level.Idea Cellular has faced problems of shrinking revenues and expanding losses over the past few quarters. The most recent negative for the stock has been the sharp cut in the Interconnection Usage Charge (IUC) by TRAI. The reduction in IUC reduced Idea Cellulars revenue and EBITDA by ~Rs820cr and ~Rs230cr respectively in Q3FY18.Idea Cellular, a wireless operator, is the third largest mobile service provider in India. In October 2017, Idea Cellular received approval from the shareholders and creditors of the company to proceed with its merger with Vodafone. The combined entity would have a subscriber base of ~450 million subscribers. The new entity would also have a total spectrum of 1,850 MHz. As per Management statements, the merger is expected to be complete in 2018.We expect the company to report revenue de-growth of 2.6% over FY17-19E due to (a) 18.5% reduction in voice revenues over FY17-19E due to a ~48% reduction in voice revenue per minute, and (b) intense competition to reduce data rates by ~85% over FY17-19E. EBITDA margin is also expected to decline by 815bps to 20.6% in FY19E. The stock is currently trading at 11.6x FY19E EBITDA.Idea Cellular Ltd is currently trading at Rs82.15 down by Rs1.1 or 1.32% from its previous closing of Rs83.25 on the BSE.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Bajaj Finserv, Grasim and Titan added in Nifty 50 while PNB dropped from Nifty Midcap 100
Subtitle: changes shall become effective from April 2, 2018,
Content: ['Bajaj Finserv Ltd,Grasim Industries Ltd, andTitan CompanyLtd will be added in the benchmark index Nifty 50, the NSE said. The companies, which will be dropped areAmbuja Cements Ltd.,Aurobindo Pharma Ltd., and Bosch Ltd. However all three exclusions are added in Nifty Next 50. With the exclusion of Aurobindo Pharma, the count of pharma companies will be four. Number of financial services firms will be 11 after Bajaj FInserv Ltds inclusion.In September, 2017 also there were certain replacements. Bank of Baroda, ACC Ltd, and Tata Motors DVR were removed, while Hindustan Petroleum Corporation Ltd, Bajaj Finance Ltd and United Phosphorus Ltd were included.Apart from above changes, 46 companies will be excluded from the Nifty free float Midcap 100 index. It will also be renamed to Nifty Midcap 100.PNBis among them. Development came amid Rs11,400cr Nirav Modi fraud. These changes shall become effective from April 2, 2018 (close of March 28, 2018), India Index Services and Products Ltd (IISL), an arm of the NSE, said in a notice.IISL also announced changes in Nifty Next 50, Nifty 100 and Nifty Midcap 150 indices, among others.General Insurance Corporation of India,SBI Life Insurance Company Ltd,L&T Finance Holdings LtdandAditya Birla Capital Ltdare also added in Nifty Next 50. While major exclusions wereGlenmark Pharmaceuticals Ltd,Torrent Pharmaceuticals Ltd, Tata Power Co. Ltd, etc.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Broker Radar for Feb 22
Subtitle: Check out the stock commentaries and recommendations from foreign brokerage houses.
Content: ["Credit Suisse onBritannia Initiated Outperform with price target of Rs 5,550. Britannia well positioned to consistently gain market share. Market share to gradually increase to high thirties. Margin expansion to re-start as input costs are coming off. Expect margins to expand from April. Non-biscuit segment holds promise in long run, but dairy is a concern. Positives: strong in fast growing segment, distribution expansion in 'Hindi' belt, launch of differentiated premium products, and gain share in value segment.Credit Suisse onEscorts Maintained Outperform with price target of Rs 1,040. Dealer check suggests healthy demand trend in tractors. Offtake strong even in usually lean January month. Dealers expect momentum to continue for next few months. Dealers acknowledge positive changes in companys functioning over past few years. Tie up with DLL group also helping volumes. Prefer Escorts on tractor demand, margin expansion and attractive valuations. Expect strong earnings of with compounded growth rate of 25 percent through the financial years till March 2020.Citi onDish TV Maintained Buy; cut price target to Rs 90 from Rs 100. Though current Ebitda far worse than peers, expect better trends in the next fiscal. Merger likely to be concluded in next few days. Combined entity listing should happen in March. Merger is key to stock performance. Stock is attractively priced post the underperformance. Could see decent returns with the merger.HSBC onIdea Cellular Maintained Reduce with price target of Rs 75. Idea-Vodafone combined needs $5.8 billion to invest in CAPEX. Merged entity could explore bringing in a strategic partner before merger completion. Strategic partner might come in to fund the CAPEX. Without 4G capex, the merged entity could lose 8-10 percent market share.HSBC onM&M Maintained Buy; raised price target to Rs 840 from Rs 795. Delay in new launches is discomforting, but doesnt impact the stock. Tractor business is likely to surprise positively in next fiscal as well. Expect strong growth of 10-12 percent in the next fiscal. Near-term outlook for the auto and tractor businesses appears positive. Positives: strong rural demand, good commercial vehicle growth and upside from new launches.(Source: Media Reports)"]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Godrej Properties to develop 7.5 lakh sq.ft of new residential project in Gurgaon
Tags: ['Godrej Properties Ltd', 'Godrej Properties Ltd share price', 'real estate']
Subtitle: On February 01, 2018, the company had launched 2 projects in Bangalore and 1 in Noida.
Content: ['Godrej Properties Ltd(GPL) has announced the expansion of its residential portfolio in National Capital Region (NCR), with an addition of a new residential project in Gurgaon.This project will offer around 70,500 sq.m (~7.5lakh sq.ft) of saleable area and will be developed as a modern group housing development. This project is situated in an established location within Gurgaon City and has excellent connectivity to the various key micro-markets in Gurgaon.This is GPLs twelfth project within the National Capital Region (NCR). Within five years of entering the NCR market, Godrej Properties has established itself as one of the market leaders in NCR and hopes to further build on this position.GPL has around 150mn sq.ft of developable area across India. The companys total area sold grew by 90% yoy to 4.78mn sq.ft and total booking value grew by 140% to Rs4,029cr in 9MFY18. The companys excellent brand image makes it an attractive partner for joint development projects. The company has launched three projects with 5.25mn sq.ft in January 2018 and expects to launch five projects in FY19E. The total area in both these projects could be around 18mn sq.ft. This we believe will help the company to sustain its growth momentum.Godrej Properties Ltd ended at Rs772 up by Rs5.8 or 0.76% from its previous closing of Rs766.20 on the BSE.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Mahindra Logistics opens its largest multi-user facility in Pune
Subtitle: The space was expected to be handed over in April but it has commissioned earlier than expectations.
Content: ['Mahindra Logisticshas signed, Chakan (Pune) based Embassy Industrial Parks, one of the largest spaces in the country comprising of built-to-suit facilities ranging from 50,000 sq. ft. to 2lakh sq. ft. in size. The facility is ready to lease for warehousing purpose.Embassy Industrial Parks is a joint venture between Embassy Group, Indias leading property developer and Warburg Pincus, a leading global private equity player.Chakan is an automotive belt and Mahindra Logistics already has some existing relationships and volumes, hence it will be utilized properly, as per the company expectations. Additionally, this warehouse is also owned by the big investors, as mentioned above, hence it is expected to be a better facility than the individual owned warehouse.The space was expected to be handed over in April but it has commissioned earlier than expectations.\xa0This is a positive news on the counter.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Allahabad Bank says exposure to Rotomac group at Rs520cr
Subtitle: The state-owned bank's exposure has remained unchanged since 2006, with Rs43.1cr worth of outstanding exposure to Rotomac Exim Pvt Ltd and Rs315cr towards Rotomac Global Pvt Ltd.
Content: ["Allahabad Bankhas exposure of Rs517cr to Rotomac group companies as on Jan 31, the lender said in an exchange filing today.The state-owned bank's exposure has remained unchanged since 2006, with Rs43.1cr worth of outstanding exposure to Rotomac Exim Pvt Ltd and Rs315cr towards Rotomac Global Pvt Ltd.Allahabad Bank also has Rs159cr exposure to Rotomac Exports Pvt Ltd, albeit through a consortium led by Bank of India.Bank of Baroda has exposure of Rs457cr to Rotomac Global Pvt Ltd and has filed a case against the company with the Central Bureau of Investigation for alleged misappropriation of funds.The investigative agency has registered a first information report against Vikram Kothari, promoter of Rotomac Pens.The modus operandi involved credit sanctioned to the company being used for purposes other than executing export orders, with banks allegedly compromising on norms to sanction loans to the company.CBI has since raided Kothari's offices and residential premises.A consortium of seven banks i.e. Bank of India, Oriental Bank of Commerce, Bank of Baroda, Allahabad Bank, Bank of Maharashtra, Union Bank of India, and Indian Overseas Bank--led by Bank of India currently have exposure of Rs2,919cr to the company.Allahabad Bank today said that accounts belonging to Rotomac group companies have been classified as non-performing assets and required provisions have been made.Rotomac Global and Rotomac Exports were taken to the National Company Law Tribunal on Sep 20.The recovery process for the third company--Rotomac Exim--is underway, said Allahabad Bank."]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Govt imposes anti-dumping duty on Chinese ceramic tableware
Subtitle: The government has imposed definitive anti-dumping duty on ceramic tableware and kitchenware imported from China for five years starting June 2017
Content: ["The government has imposed definitive anti-dumping duty on ceramic tableware and kitchenware imported from China for five years starting June 2017, the finance ministry said in a notification.The definitive anti-dumping duty of $1.04 per kg on ceramic tableware and kitchenware is based on the findings of the Directorate General of Anti-Dumping and Allied Duties that the imports were causing material injury to the domestic industry.On Jun 12, 2017, India had imposed provisional anti-dumping duty on these goods for a period of six months.The anti-dumping duty will not be applicable for the period between Dec 12, 2017, and Feb 20, 2018, when the provisional anti-dumping duty had lapsed, the notification said.The Directorate General of Anti-Dumping and Allied Duties had initiated anti-dumping investigation on ceramic tableware and kitchenware in October 2016, based on a complaint by the All India Pottery Manufacturers' Association."]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Markets expected to be volatile ahead of Feb Expiry

Content: ["SGX Nifty is indicating a negative for the Indian markets.Indian markets are expected to continue to witness volatility in todays trade as faster than anticipated hikes in US interest rates lifted treasury yields to highest levels in more than a decade.In stock specific news Aurobindo Pharma, Ambuja Cements and Bosch to be excluded from Nifty 50, while BajajFinserve, Grasim, and Titan would be included in the index from April 2.Global markets:\xa0Asian markets are also trading mixed at present. Nikkei is currently down 1.25%, Hang Seng is trading 1.12% lower, while Shanghai Composite is up 1.40%.US Markets: Wall Street witnessed selling pressure in yesterdays trade. The Dow fell 0.7% to 24,797.78, the Nasdaq dipped 0.2% to 7,218.23 and the S&P 500 fell 0.6% to 2,701.33. Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Key US indices end lower Wed; interest rates may rise
Subtitle: The US central bank said it believes that inflation can reach its 2% target, but does not think inflation is getting out of hand.
Content: ["Key equities indices in US closed lower on Wednesday as the benchmark 10-year bond yields jumped after the release of the minutes of the Fed's January meeting.The minutes revealed that the Federal Reserve sees increased economic growth and an uptick in inflation as justification to continue to raise interest rates gradually.The US central bank said it believes that inflation can reach its 2% target, but does not think inflation is getting out of hand.Real estate stocks fell nearly 2%.IndexLast LevelChange (%)Dow Jones Industrial Average24797.7(0.67)S&P 5002701.33(0.55)NASDAQ Composite7218.22(0.22)"]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Jain Irrigation bags Rs375cr contract from Pune Municipal Corporation
Subtitle: Under this contract, JISL will undertake a detailed study and analysis of the present intermediate water supply system and will provide the effective solution to convert it in to 24x7 equitable water distribution system with adequate pressure, with considerable reduction in leakages and non-revenue water, SCADA system, O&M and to ensure complete satisfaction of the consumer.
Content: ['Jain Irrigation Systems Ltd(JISL)\xa0has been awarded Rs375cr turnkey contract by Pune Municipal Corporation. The contract involves "Study, Survey, Investigation, Assessment, Design validation and Revamping of entire Water Supply System including Water Audit, Non-Revenue Water reduction, SCADA, Bill reading and generation, Operation and Maintenance of the system"Under this contract, JISL will undertake a detailed study and analysis of the present intermediate water supply system and will provide the effective solution to convert it in to 24x7 equitable water distribution system with adequate pressure, with considerable reduction in leakages and non-revenue water, SCADA system, O&M and to ensure complete satisfaction of the consumer. This project involves a pipeline of 508Km, installation & billing for 49,000 water meters including 1,339 kms laying of utility ducts apart from water pipe line.Pune Municipal Corporation has drawn up an ambitious plan to provide on a 24X7 basis pressurized water supply to residents in its area and also has decided to implement 100% smart metering, covering every household of Pune City over the next 5 years. The scheme envisages elimination of the Non-Revenue Water (NRW) of the city by plugging losses and upgrading the entire water supply network. Pune is the first large city in India which will execute a project of this nature on such a large scale.Atul Jain, Jt Managing Director said after receiving the order, "We are proud to have received the order for creating an integrated network of drinking water supply for such a large city, and the residents of Pune City will experience, on completion a seamless drinking water supply at constant pressure with correct metering and billing. We hope this will act like a model project for other cities in Maharashtra and other parts of the country also".']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Stocks that dropped over 20% in last 30 days
Subtitle: Indian stock market has witnessed downward trend in the past one month (January 25  February 23, 2018). Following is the list of the stocks from BSE 500 that have fallen sharply in the past one month.
Content: ['Indian stock market has witnessed a downward trend in the past one month (January 25  February 23, 2018). Nifty 50 and Sensex slumped~578 points and 1,908 pointsrespectively over the same period.As per Governments recapitalization plan of infusing Rs88,139cr capital in 20public sector banks before March 31, 2018, higher allocation was given to weaker banks, while lesser to healthier banks. This was opposite to the market expectations, as per the media reports, and hurt the broader market sentiment.Introduction of long term capital gain tac (LTCG) on equity gains above Rs1lakh @ 10%, revision of fiscal deficit target for FY2018-19 to 3.3% of the GDP vs. earlier target of 3% has affected the market performance. Rising bond yields and RBIs increased inflation target (to 5.1%) for the fourth quarter also created panic in the Indian markets.The icing on the cake was PNBs confirmation of Rs11,600cr fraud against jeweller Nirav Modi. The default loan case against Vikram Kothari of Rotomac group for ~Rs3,600cr filed by state run bank also dragged the market performance.Below is the list of the stocks from BSE 500 that have fallen sharply in the past one month.Company NamePrice as on Jan 25,2018 in RsPrice as on Feb 23,2018 in RsGain/(Loss) in %Vakrangee Ltd.505.4190.0(62.4)PC Jeweller Ltd.561.0332.9(40.7)Punjab National Bank180.8113.4(37.3)Allahabad Bank70.452.1(26.0)Aban Offshore Ltd.233.3172.7(26.0)IFCI Ltd.30.823.2(24.7)Birla Corporation Ltd.1,150.0873.4(24.0)Bank Of India169.3129.1(23.8)Union Bank Of India141.1108.8(22.9)Shilpa Medicare Ltd.582.6449.5(22.8)Siti Networks Ltd.25.019.3(22.8)Titagarh Wagons Ltd.165.0127.8(22.5)Natco Pharma Ltd.995.2778.4(21.8)Graphite India Ltd.792.5621.0(21.6)Dena Bank26.620.9(21.6)Syndicate Bank76.760.8(20.8)APL Apollo Tubes Ltd.2,518.92,001.4(20.5)Source:Ace Equity']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: The week that was, Nifty snaps 3-week losing streak
Subtitle: The IT sector outperformed during the week after Nasscom projected that the Indian IT services industry is expected to grow at 7-9% in FY19.
Content: ['After going through a dismal February series, indices have welcomed the March series on a positive note as benchmarks find some relief from the relentless selling seen in the past three weeks. Fears of more than three rate hikes by the Fed seem to have deteriorated bringing down bond yields which triggered a relief rally.The IT sector outperformed during the week after Nasscom projected that the Indian IT services industry is expected to grow at 7-9% in FY19. Besides, Sun Pharma stole the limelight amid USFDA Halol plant inspection. The stock shot up on Friday despite U.S. drug regulator issuing a Form 483 with three observations.Meanwhile, Indias trade deficit hit a 56-month high in the month of January. A 9% rise in exports at US$24.3bn was outweighed by a 26% rise in imports which stood at US$40.6bn. This has left a trade gap of US$16.3bn, the highest since May 2013.On the other hand, Foreign direct investment (FDI) in India increased by a marginal 0.27% to US$35.9bn during the April-December period of the current fiscal,For the week, Nifty and Sensex marginally gained by 0.4% each.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Is this the perfect Bull Trap? Head & Shoulder pattern visible on Nifty
Subtitle: If Nifty cracks below the 10,275 mark on closing basis it would lead to a larger structural breakdown on the daily chart.
Content: ['Nifty staged a smart come back and just missed the 10,500 mark by a small margin. The index not only found support around the 10,300-10,275 area but it also coincided with the rising trendline support zone on daily chart. The current upmove has lifted support zone to 10,400.Overall, there is aHead and Shoulder patternwhich is clearly visible on the daily chart and the current scenario is a make or break one for the Nifty. If Nifty cracks below the 10,275 mark on closing basis it would lead to a larger structural breakdown. However, if Nifty pierces above the 10,620 mark it would negate the bearish Head and Shoulder pattern.On the contrary, if Nifty cracks below the 10,275\xa0mark on closing basis it would lead to a larger structural breakdown on the daily chart.Bank Nifty, on the other hand, has already broken down from aHead and Shoulder patternon the daily chart. However, the index has held above the 24,800 support zone and immediate hurdle is seen around the 25,500 mark. On the upside, for the bearish pattern to be negated, Bank Nifty has to rally past the 26,000 psychological mark on closing basis.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: India stocks seen extending gains next week on global cues
Subtitle: Investors will also keep an eye on the detailing of automobile sales numbers for February.
Content: ["Domestic share indices are seen extending their gains to next week as markets across the globe shrugged off worries over an increase in pace of interest rate hikes in the US.A Federal Reserve official\xa0on Thursday\xa0said he expects the US central bank to raise interest rates twice in 2018 as against the Fed's own guidance of three hikes.Next week the Nifty 50 is seen moving in a range of 10,300-10,650 points.Today, the Nifty 50 ended at 10,491.05, up 108.35 points or 1% from its previous close. The Sensex ended at 34,142.15, up 322.65 points or 0.9%.Market participants will monitor global markets, with the US Federal Reserve due to publish its monetary policy report today, before new chair Jerome Powell's testimony to the Congress next week.Investors will also keep an eye on the detailing of automobile sales numbers for February.Shares of metal companies are expected to continue their rise next week.Metal companies were the top performers today, after equity markets in China reopened after being closed for a week on account of Lunar New Year holidays.Some automobile stocks are also expected to outperform benchmark indices next week."]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: IDBI Bank shareholders approves pref basis share issue
Subtitle: The shareholders of bank have approved the issuance of 44.14 cr shares to the government at Rs61.83 a share.
Content: ["The shareholders ofIDBI bankhave approved the issuance of 44.14 cr shares to the government at Rs61.83 a share. On Jan 15, the bank's board of directors had approved raising Rs2730cr through preferential allotment of shares to the government.IDBI Bank ended at Rs77.10 up by Rs3.1 or 4.19% from its previous closing of Rs74 on the BSE. The scrip opened at Rs73.05 and touched a high and low of Rs77.45 and Rs73.05 respectively. A total of 3,31,94,546(NSE+BSE) shares were traded on the counter. The current market cap of the company is Rs19,554.43cr.\xa0The stock traded above its 50 DMA.The banks loan book for Q2FY18 end stood at ~Rs1.83 lakh cr. The banks GNPA and NNPA for Q2FY18 stood at 24.98% and 16.06% respectively. The bank's Capital Adequacy Ratio is at 11.98% as of Q2FY18 end. The provision coverage ratio for Q2FY18 stood at 54.6%. Its credit cost for Q2FY18 stood at 278 bps. Its cost to income ratio for Q2FY18 is at 29.2%.IDBI bank is getting Rs10,600cr under PSU banks recapitalization programme for FY18 besides government has infused Rs1,861cr in Q2FY18. Also the bank is in the process of selling its non-core assets. These funds will allow the bank to provide for its bad loans and to maintain its regulatory capital. The bank expects its resolution of stressed assets by Q4FY18 and Q1FY19. We believe for next few quarters the banks bad loans provisioning would remain higher, which would dent its profitability. Its NIM is expected at ~2% for FY18E against ~1.7% reported in FY17."]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: SREI Infra, Uttar Pradesh govt sign MoU for redevelopment of Agra
Subtitle: The company will assist the government in mobilising resources and investments for creation of necessary infrastructure in Agra.
Content: ['SREI Infrahas signed memorandum of understanding with Uttar Pradesh government announcing a new co-operation agreement for redevelopment of Agra as an iconic tourist-cum-holiday destination.The company will assist the government in mobilising resources and\xa0\xa0 investments for creation of necessary infrastructure in Agra.The state government expects to attract investments around Rs25,000cr in the state through the project.SREI Infra ended at Rs81.85 up by Rs4.05 or 5.21% from its previous closing of Rs77.80 on the BSE.The scrip opened at Rs77.20 and touched a high and low of Rs82.80 and Rs77.20 respectively. A total of 19,34,531(NSE+BSE) shares were traded on the counter. The current market cap of the company is Rs3,914.04cr.\xa0The stock traded below its 200 DMA.SREI is a leading infrastructure and equipment financing company in India. Its key business includes infrastructure project finance and infrastructure equipment finance, which contributes ~54% and 46% of revenue, respectively. Its AUM stands at Rs.37,683cr on FY17. The companys GNPAs and NNPAs in FY17 stood at 2.4% and 1.7%, respectively.A strong recovery in domestic infrastructure development activities will push companys loan growth. The company is well-capitalized (CAR at 18.9% in FY17) to leverage on the upcoming growth opportunities. We expect NIM to improve by 50bps from ~3.8% to ~4.3% over FY17-18E due to better liability management. Also, credit cost is expected to drop from ~1.8% to 1.5% in FY18E on lower NPA accretion. ROE is expected to improve from ~4.7% to ~8% over FY17-19E due to NIM improvement and lower credit cost.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Dena Bank sets Rs26.89 per share issue price for share issue to govt
Subtitle: On Feb 14, the bank's board had approved raising Rs3,045cr through preferential allotment of shares to the government.
Content: ["The issue committee ofDena Bank's board has set Rs26.89 issue price a share for preferential allotment of shares to the governmentThe bank will hold extraordinary general meeting for shareholders on Mar 27.On Feb 14, the bank's board had approved raising Rs3045cr through preferential allotment of shares to the government.Dena Bank ended at Rs20.85 up by Rs0.15 or 0.72% from its previous closing of Rs20.70 on the BSE.The scrip opened at Rs20.75 and touched a high and low of Rs20.95 and Rs20.70 respectively. A total of 13,50,061(NSE+BSE) shares were traded on the counter. The current market cap of the company is Rs2,340.86cr.\xa0The stock traded below its 200 DMA.Dena Bank's FY17 advances were dominated by large-industries (36.2%), MSMEs (16%), agriculture (16.8%), retail (17.1%) and food credit &others (13.9%). Its GNPA and NNPA stood at 16.2% and 10.6%, respectively as on FY17.Companys focus on large corporate's and MSME's led to exposure to some troubled sectors resulting in stressed asset quality. We expect this asset quality concern to continue to dampen the banks performance into FY19E. Further, the banks CAR ratio remained low at 11.3% at the end of FY17. Thus, it requires significant growth capital (~Rs.1500cr for FY18E & FY19E) to expand its loan book and substantially improve its operating performance. The governments current recapitalisation plan might be partially able to improve its CAR. Further, initiation of PCA (prompt corrective action) on bank limits itself in expanding its business activities. Also, we expect the trend of decline in the banks NIM, RoE and RoA seen over the last five fiscals to continue over FY18-19E."]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Aluminium slides below support level
