Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Bharti Airtel to sell Motorola 4G smartphones starting Rs3,999
Subtitle: The company will sell Motorola Mobility's Moto C, Moto E4 and Lenovo K8 Note devices at Rs3,999, Rs6,499 and Rs10,999, respectively.
Content: ["Bharti Airtelhas entered into a pact with Motorola Mobility India to sell its budget fourth-generation smart phones under the company's 'mera pehla smartphone' initiative.The company will sell Motorola Mobility's Moto C, Moto E4 and Lenovo K8 Note devices at Rs3,999, Rs6,499 and Rs10,999, respectively.All devices will come bundled with a special recharge of Rs169, with benefits like 1 GB of data per day and unlimited local and national calls.On purchase, the customer will get a cash back of Rs2,000 in two instalments over 36 months.Customers will have to make prepaid recharges worth Rs3,500 twice\xa0within 18 months\xa0to get the cashback instalments of Rs500 rupees and Rs1,500."]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: India stocks end three week losing streak; metal, pharma stocks gain
Subtitle: Rising interest rates in the US could tighten liquidity across the globe, thereby prompting foreign investors to pull money out of emerging markets such as India.
Content: ["Global equities rebounded today as fears of quicker interest rate hikes in the US subsided, in turn lifting the domestic benchmark Nifty 50 and Sensex by 1% each to end a three-week losing streak.Sustained selling by foreign investors due to the introduction of long-term capital gains tax and worried over the impact of the $1.77-bln fraud at Punjab National Bank have weighed on domestic equities this month.Today, US and Asian indices rebounded as comments from a Federal Reserve official allayed concerns of faster rate increases in the world's largest economy.St Louis Federal President James Bullard said policymakers need to be careful not to increase rates too quickly because that could slow the economy. His comments comforted investors who were starting to fear that the US central bank would raise rates four times in 2018 instead of the three that was projected earlier.Rising interest rates in the US could tighten liquidity across the globe, thereby prompting foreign investors to pull money out of emerging markets such as India, dealers said.The Nifty 50 ended at 10,491.05, up 108.35 points or 1% from the previous close, while Sensex closed 322.65 points higher or up 0.9% at 34,142.15, ending the week with 0.3% and 0.4% gains, respectively.Volatility gauge India VIX ended over 4% lower tracking the surge in global as well as domestic equities.Gains in metal and pharmaceutical stocks underpinned the rise in indices today, but all sectoral indices ended higher than their previous close.Shares of metal companies were the top performers, as equity markets in China reopened after being closed for a week for Lunar New Year holidays.Strength in base metals prices aided gains in shares of domestic metal companies, with Tata Steel surging over 6% to be the top gainer on the Nifty 50.Sun Pharmaceutical Industries closed 5% higher as the three observations issued by US Food and Drug Administration were perceived to be non-critical. Other pharmaceutical companies also saw buying on the back of a churn by portfolio managers towards defensive stocks.Jubilant Life ended close to 11% lower on reports that the company's promoters have ended the process of their stake sale worth $75mn.HDFC Bank and Reliance Industries were majorly responsible for the gains seen on benchmark index BSE Sensex contributing 43 points and 33 points respectively from its total gain of 323 points.Volume topper on BSE Sensex was NTPC with TTQ of 7,178,380 and 2,004 total number of trades. ICICI Bank came in second with TTQ of 3,483,296 and 4,235 trades.The BSE MidCap Index ended with a positive 1.47% and the BSE SmallCap Index also gained 1.54%.Tata Steel (6%), Sun Pharma (+6%), UPL (+3%), Tech Mahindra (+3.5%) and Vedanta (+3%) were the top gainers on Nifty50.Asian Paints (-1.5%), GAIL (-1.4%), Infosys (-0.5%), Eicher Motors (-0.5%) and Hindustan Unilever (-0.4%) were the top losers in todays trade.Out of 1,521 stocks traded on the NSE, 1151 advanced, 327 declined and 43 remained unchanged today.A total of 14 stocks registered a fresh 52-week high in trade today, while 22 stocks touched a new 52-week low on the NSE."]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Gold gave better returns than equity in Feb
Subtitle: Gold has shown again why it is called safe haven. In the month of February, the precious metal gave returns of 1.27%.
Content: ['Gold has shown again why it is called safe haven. In the month of February, the precious metal gave returns of 1.27%, whereas other major tradeable securities performed poorly and gave negative returns; Nifty 50 gave -4.8% returns, while Nifty 10 Year Benchmark G Sec gave -1.86% returns, besides others.And so, although equities, Bitcoin (cryptocurrencies), Bonds etc may have been in the spotlight for different reasons, gold has by far been the top performing tradable security across the world and has given handsome returns to its investors.Following table shows that in the month of February, all the other securities gave negative returns except goldSecuritiesJanuary CloseTodays priceReturnNifty 5011,027.7010,491.05-4.8%Nifty 10 Year Benchmark G Sec918.38901.27-1.86%BITCOIN$10,284$10,077-2.01%Gold30,11730,5001.27%Source: IIFL Research']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Broader markets shine as indices post a stellar show
Subtitle: Nifty & Bank Nifty futures witnessed a surge in open interest to the tune of ~12 lakh/ 1.22 lakh shares indicating marginal buildup of long position.
Content: ['Markets post a sharp recovery as all the major indices closed around its highest intraday levels.Nifty and Bank Nifty index gained 1% each, while Nifty Mid-cap and Small-cap indices outperformed the benchmark index gaining over 2% each.Sun Pharma was the top index gainer, closing ~6% higher. After more than a week of underperformance, market breadth ended in favour of advances with advance/decline ratio closing at 3:1x.Nifty & Bank Nifty futures witnessed a surge in open interest to the tune of ~12 lakh/ 1.22 lakh shares indicating marginal buildup of long position.Tracking the options front, Nifty10500 CE added ~8.35 lakh shares in open positions, consisting of mainly long positions.As the maximum O.I call strike shifted from 11,000 to 10,500, a break above 105,00 mark can lead to fresh upward momentum for the index.India Vix index closed 4.2% lower ending at 14.2.Nifty+108 points @ 10491Bank Nifty+347 points @ 25302Top 2 F&O GainerMINDTREE, FORTISTop 2 F&O LoserSIEMENS, GAILMost Active Index Option ContractCall Option10500CE, O.I: +~8.35 lakh sharesPut Option10300PE, O.I: + ~10 lakh sharesNifty Max O.I Strikes11000CE, 10000PEBank Nifty Max O.I Strikes25500CE, 24500PE (1STMarch 2018 Expiry)']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Genus Paper & Boards Ltd surged 5%, entered MoUs of Rs1,650cr
Tags: ['Genus Paper', 'Genus Paper & Boards Ltd', 'Genus Paper share price']
Subtitle: MoUs are for setting up of Kraft Paper manufacturing plant and for expansion of current manufacturing facility
Content: ["Genus Paper & Boards Ltdsurged 5% and locked at upper circuit today after the announcement that it has entered into a) A non-binding MoU with Government of Maharashtra to invest Rs1,050cr for setting up of Kraft Paper manufacturing plant; and b) A non-binding MoU with the Government of Uttar Pradesh to invest Rs600cr for expansion of current manufacturing facility.The company will incur the investing amount within a period of 5 years from the date of application after completion of all effective steps. Company has also leased a Kraft paper manufacturing facility for 5 years w. e. f. January 22, 2018. The facility is located at Kashipur, Uttarakhand and has manufacturing capacity of 75,000 metric tonnes p. a. (MTPA). It is an operational plant and the leasing would help to cater to the demand of its existing clients. This has enhanced its manufacturing capacities by 50%.Genus Paper & Boards opened on a higher note with a gap of 5% at Rs 14.60 and remained stuck at that level til the end of Friday's session."]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Sun Pharma receives three observations at Halol
Subtitle: The USFDA concluded it's Halol inspection today and issued a Form 483 with three observations as per the exchange filing.
Content: ["Sun Pharmahas received three form 483 observations post inspection at it's Halol facility. The USFDA concluded it's Halol inspection today and issued a Form 483 with three observations as per the exchange filing.The company is now preparing the response to the observations, which will\xa0 be submitted to the USFDA within 15 business days.The corrective actions taken by the company have led to a reduction in the observations from nine to three which is a positive sign; however, one has to see if the new observations are minor in nature.The future of the US business is closely tied with the Halol facility and hence it remains a critical facility for Sun Pharma.Sun Pharma is currently trading at Rs574.80 up by Rs32.65 or 6.02% from its previous closing of Rs542.15 on the BSE. The scrip opened at Rs550 and has touched a high and low of Rs575 and Rs546.20 respectively."]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Fortis Health ends higher on reports of IHH Health in fray to buy company
Subtitle: In June, IHH Healthcare had backed out of its pursuit of Fortis Healthcare and its arm SRL Diagnostics.
Content: ['Shares ofFortis Healthcarerose 5% after a media report said Malaysia-based IHH Healthcare Bhd has re-entered the race to buy the former.In June, IHH Healthcare had backed out of its pursuit of Fortis Healthcare and its arm SRL Diagnostics due to concerns over the Daiichi Sankyo arbitration award case.TPG, a private investment firm, is also believed to be in fray to merge Fortis Healthcare and infuse Rs5,000cr in the hospital-chain owner, the report said.Fortis Healthcare ended at Rs159.95 up by Rs13.65 or 9.33% from its previous closing of Rs146.30 on the BSE.The scrip opened at Rs144.10 and has touched a high and low of Rs167 and Rs143 respectively. So far 7,66,33,799 (NSE+BSE) shares were traded on the counter. The current market cap of the company is Rs7,587.96cr.Fortis Healthcare has two businesses i.e. hospitals and diagnostics (SRL Limited). Hospital business contributed 81% of FY17 revenue, while rest 18% came from the diagnostic business. FHL operates 45 healthcare facilities in India and abroad (including projects under development) with ~10,000 potential beds. The top 10 healthcare facilities contributed ~77.4% of the hospital business revenue in Q1FY18. SRL had a network of 368 labs and ~5,350 collection points by Q1FY18 end.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: NBCC gains on report co to sign MoU for housing project
Subtitle: Nearly 1.8 million shares of the company have been traded on NSE, higher than the six-month daily average of 1.7 million shares.
Content: ['Shares ofNBCC (India)rose over 3% today after reports said that the company will sign a memorandum of understanding with the Department of Economic Affairs today for construction of a housing project for officers of the Indian Economic Service.So far today, nearly 1.8 million shares of the company have been traded on NSE, higher than the six-month daily average of 1.7 million shares.On technical charts, the stock is seen facing resistance at Rs200.20.NBCC (India) Ltd is currently trading at Rs198.05 up by Rs5.15 or 2.67% from its previous closing of Rs192.90 on the BSE.The scrip opened at Rs193.20 and has touched a high and low of Rs198.95 and Rs193.20 respectively. So far 23,17,796(NSE+BSE) shares were traded on the counter. The current market cap of the company is Rs17,361cr.NBCC Ltd is a Navratna PSU engaged in the business of project management consultancy (PMC), real estate and EPC. Through PMC, which contributes 87% of the revenue, the company has been executing many landmark projects. PMC and redevelopment comprises 87%, real estate and EPC forms 13% of the companys Q2FY18 order book.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: India VIX falls 9% on gains in local, global equities
Subtitle: The Nifty 50 and Sensex rose 0.8% each, tracking a rebound in most Asian and US markets.
Content: ['Volatility gauge India VIX fell as much as 9% today, tracking the surge in global and local equities.The Nifty 50 and Sensex rose 0.8% each, tracking a rebound in most Asian and US markets.Domestic shares are seen consolidating for the next few weeks due to lack of major triggers and concerns over high valuations.At\xa0 2.40 PM, India VIX was down 5.68% at 14.8325.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Benchmark indices near day's high on global cues
Subtitle: Shares of metal stocks rose the most as the markets in China reopened after Lunar New Year holidays and because of the strength in base metal prices.
Content: ['Domestic benchmark indices were trading near their intraday highs in the afternoon trade following the positive trend in global equities and as the traders covered short positions.India VIX falls 9% on gains in local, global equities.Shares of metal stocks rose the most as the markets in China reopened after Lunar New Year holidays and because of the strength in base metal prices. Nifty Metal was up 2.5% at 4003 points.At 2:00 PM, the Nifty 50 was at 10,479 points, up 96 points, while Sensex was at 34,105 points, up 286 points.Shares of Fortis Healthcare up 5% after a media report said Malaysia-based IHH Healthcare Bhd has re-entered the race to buy the former.Adani Transmission was trading higher on letter of intent from PFC arm.NBCC gained on report co to sign MoU for housing project.Tata Steel (+6.62%), Sun Pharma (+5.16%), UPL (+3.50%), Hindalco (+2.88%) and Auro Pharma (+2.77%) were the top gainers on Nifty50.GAIL (-1.47%), Asian Paint (-1.10%), Eicher Motors (-0.45%), M&M (-0.26%) and Infosys (+0.24%) were the top losers in todays trade.A total of 11 stocks registered a fresh 52-week high in trade today, while 17 stocks touched a new 52-week low on the NSE.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Yash Papers has entered into MOU with UP state government, rises 6%
Subtitle: The company plans to double its capacity of Tableware Unit.
Content: ['Yash Papers Ltdhas entered into MOU with UP state government for Rs73.44cr for expansion of its Paper Unit III and Tableware Unit capacity. The company plans to increase its installed capacity to 100MT from existing 70MT of Paper Unit III. For Tableware unit, it plans to double its capacity to 23MT.Yash Papers Ltd, participated in Investor Summit on February 21, 2018 and February 22, 2018 organised by UP state government. The company has showcased CHUK tableware range. CHUK is our new range of products and we are looking forward for new business opportunities for us, while focusing on our ethics of sustainability, Ved Krishna, Head of Strategy, Yash Papers said, as per the media reports. CHUK tableware range is a compostable tableware range. It is made out of sugarcane waste which is safe for environment.Yash Papers Ltd is currently trading at Rs74.60 up by Rs4.3 or 6.12% from its previous closing of Rs70.30 on the BSE. The scrip opened at Rs72 and has touched a high and low of Rs77.50 and Rs72 respectively. The stock is currently trading above its 50 DMA.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Nifty has come slightly off day's high
Subtitle: Nifty Metal index is the top gainer followed by Pharma and PSU bank index.
Content: ["Nifty has come slightly off day's high in the morning trades amid profit booking seen around the 10,450 levels, which is also the immediate resistance zone. Support is now upgraded to 10,350 levels.The India Vix has declined by over 5%.Nifty Metal index is the top gainer followed by Pharma and PSU bank index.At 11:35 AM, the Nifty 50 index was at 10,435 points, up 52 points, while Sensex was at 33,961 points, up 142 points.GMR Infra is tradeing at day's highShares of Seamec hit 52-wk high on vessel deal with Kreuz Subsea.Shares of Jubilant Life dropped 9% on reports of promoters selling stakeAdani Transmission receives LOI for 200 ckt kms transmission Network in RajasthanTata Steel (+3.65%), Auro Pharma (+2.91%), Vedanta (+2.88%), Yes Bank (+2.77%) and UPL (+2.48%) were the top gainers on Nifty50.GAIL (-2.43%), TCS (-1.73%), Asian Paints (-0.90%), Infosys (-0.85%) and Eicher Motors (+0.82%) were the top losers in todays trade.A total of 9 stocks registered a fresh 52-week high in trade today, while 15 stocks touched a new 52-week low on the NSE."]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Jubilant Life slumps on reports of promoters selling stake
Tags: ['Jubilant Life', 'Jubilant Life share price', 'Jubilant Life Sciences']
Subtitle: Promoters of the company held 19.21% stake in the life sciences company as on December 31, shareholding data showed.
Content: ["Shares ofJubilant Life Sciencesslumped 10% on report that the company's promoters have ended the process of their stake sale worth $75mn.Promoters of the company held 19.21% stake in the life sciences company as on December 31, shareholding data showed.Jubilant Life Sciences is currently trading at Rs898 down by Rs94.15 or 9.49% from its previous closing of Rs992.15 on the BSE. The scrip opened at Rs974 and has touched a high and low of Rs974 and Rs888 respectively. So far 1,11,18,671 (NSE+BSE) shares were traded on the counter. The current market cap of the company is Rs15,804.95cr.\xa0The stock is currently trading above its 50 DMA.Jubilant Life Sciences is engaged into business of pharmaceuticals, life science ingredients (LSI) and drug discovery solutions contributing 52%, 45% and 3% respectively to FY17 revenue. Injectable is the fastest growing segment, contributing 28% to the revenue.Company expects growth in pharma segment with long term (~3.5 years) Radiopharma contract and approvals to market Ruby-Fill speciality product in US. However, the price attrition in the US market is expected to impact generic business of Jubilant. In LSI, company would transit to profitable products with better product mix. Capacity expansion at LSI plants, alternative strategy to build CMO (Contract manufacturing) and future approval of 32 pending ANDAs are also expected to boost revenue by 18.6% CAGR over FY18E-20E. The companys plans to reduce debt and interest cost would increase the net earnings of the company. We expect PAT CAGR of 28.5% over FY18-20E. The stock is currently trading at 12.9x of its FY20E EPS."]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Adani Transmission receives LOI for 200ckt kms transmission Network in Rajasthan
Subtitle: ATLs cumulative transmission network of ATL to reach ~12,000 ckt kms
Content: ["Adani Transmission Ltd(ATL) has received a Letter of Intent (LOI) for a transmission network project. The Fatehgarh-Bhadla transmission project would consist of ~200 ckt kms of line at voltage level of 765 KV and one substation at voltage level of 400 KV. The LOI states that project would be in the Build, Own, Operate and Maintain format. With this project, ATL will expand its presence in Rajasthan with 2 operational transmission projects 4 more assets under construction. With this new addition, ATLs cumulative transmission network of ATL would reach ~12,000 ckt kms, out of which ~9,000 ckt kms are under operation. The transformation capacity of ATL will also increase to 19,300 MVA from 35 substations (including 8 EHV Substations under acquisition).Adani Transmission manages electricity distribution, transmission and generation assets across the country. In January 2018, the company acquired the Mumbai generation, transmission and distribution business of R-Infra for a total consideration of Rs12,101cr. This acquisition has increased the size of the company quite significantly. The transmission business now has a capacity of 12,000 circuit kms with 9,540 circuit kms under operation. The new distribution business has a customer base of over 3 million customers with an annual demand of ~10,800mn units. Moreover, the company also acquired a power generation project of 500MW.We expect the company to report revenue CAGR of 2.9% over FY17-20E aided by addition of ~540 ckt kms in transmission capacity. EBITDA margins are likely to expand by 174bps over FY17-20E aided by efficiency gains in the transmission business. The stock is currently trading at 10.5x FY20E EV/EBITDA.Adani Transmission Ltd is currently trading at Rs209.95 up by Rs2.4 or 1.16% from its previous closing of Rs207.55 on the BSE.\xa0The scrip opened at Rs210.10 and has touched a high and low of Rs214.30 and Rs208.90 respectively.\xa0The BSE group 'A' stock of face value Rs10 has touched a 52 week high of Rs252 on 18-Jan-2018 and a 52 week low of Rs60.50 on 09-Mar-2017. Last one week high and low of the scrip stood at Rs214.95 and Rs192 respectively.The promoters holding in the company stood at 74.92 % while Institutions and Non-Institutions held 22.1 % and 2.98 % respectively.The stock is currently trading below its 50 DMA."]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Seamec hits 52-wk high on vessel deal with Kreuz Subsea
Subtitle: The contract is valid for 50 days and is for an offshore job on the western coast of India.
Content: ['Shares ofSeamecgained over 3% today to hit a 52-week high of Rs195 after the\xa0company said it has entered into a contract withKreuzSubseafor charter hire of its vessel i.e. Revelation, for $300,000.The contract is valid for 50 days and is for an offshore job on the western coast of India.SEAMEC Ltd is currently trading at Rs192 up by Rs4.5 or 2.4% from its previous closing of Rs187.50 on the BSE. The scrip opened at Rs192 and has touched a high and low of Rs193 and Rs188.65 respectively. So far 12,081 (NSE+BSE) shares were traded on the counter.The current market cap of the company is Rs476.72cr. On technical charts, the stock is seen facing a resistance at Rs200.90.\xa0The stock is currently trading above its 50 DMA.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Sun Pharma surges ahead of outcome of Halol unit audit
Subtitle: The US FDA had begun inspecting the unit on Feb 12 and is expected to conclude the inspection later today.
Content: ["Shares ofSun Pharmaceutical Industries(Sun Pharma) rose nearly 4% ahead of the outcome of the US Food and Drug Administration's inspection of the company's unit in Halol, Gujarat, later today.The US FDA had begun inspecting the unit on Feb 12 and is expected to conclude the inspection later today.Markets seem to factor in that the drug maker is going to clear the inspection after failing in the previous two attempts.Sun Pharma is currently trading at Rs564.25 up by Rs22.1 or 4.08% from its previous closing of Rs542.15 on the BSE. The scrip opened at Rs550 and has touched a high and low of Rs569.10 and Rs549.80 respectively. So far 67,34,882 (NSE+BSE) shares were traded on the counter.\xa0The stock is currently trading above its 50 DMA.Sun Pharmas US formulations and Indian-branded Generics contributed 45% and 26% respectively to FY17 revenue, while Emerging markets, ROW and API contributed 15%, 9% and 5% respectively. It has a strong pipeline for the US market with 136 ANDAs and 4 NDAs awaiting approval.We believe that Sun Pharma is expected to see recovery in its US business, which should see double digit growth in FY19E. Owing to the recovery in the US business, Sun Pharmas EBITDA margins should see improvement to ~24% in FY19E and 26% in FY20E. Overall, Sun Pharma is expected to witness revenue growth at ~14% CAGR over FY18E-20E. The bottom-line is estimated to remain weak in FY18E, however we expect recovery in profitability from FY19E onwards. The stock currently trades at 24.6x its FY20E EPS."]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Federal Bank up 5%; to buy 26% stake in Equirus Capital
Subtitle: Federal Bank didn't disclose all the financial details of the deal, but the bank will now be at par with other private lenders extending financial and capital market services to investors.
Content: ["Shares ofFederal Bankrose 5% today, as its board has approved buying 26% stake in financial services company Equirus Capital.Federal Bank didn't disclose all the financial details of the deal, but the bank will now be at par with other private lenders extending financial and capital market services to investors.Federal Bank is currently trading at Rs93.85 up by Rs3.95 or 4.39% from its previous closing of Rs89.90 on the BSE. The scrip opened at Rs93.50 and has touched a high and low of Rs94.15 and Rs92.50 respectively. So far 76,57,507 (NSE+BSE) shares were traded on the counter. The current market cap of the company is Rs17,702.82cr.\xa0The stock is currently trading below its 200 DMA."]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Department of Telecom announces strategic plan to revive state-owned telecom companies
Subtitle: Companies like MTNL and ITI Ltd likely to benefit from the new plan
Content: ['The Department of Telecom (DoT) announced a strategic plan to revive state-owned telecom companies by promoting operational synergy among them. The plan coversMTNL, BSNL, andITI Ltdamong others. The plan also has stated that the companies should sell non-core assets (such as land) to improve profitability in the near term.The DoT has stated that they expect substantial and tangible progress under the strategic plan in the next six months. The DoT will periodically review progress to keep the strategic plan on track. The strategic roadmap also covers issues like standards and certification, and preparing telecom PSUs to take advantage of new opportunities in areas like 5G and Internet of Things (IoT).This strategic plan is the need of the hour in the state run telecom PSUs like ITI Ltd and MTNL. ITI Ltd, a telecom equipment manufacturer has begun the process of restructuring and the company is confident of reporting a profit in FY18. The company also sold land worth Q1FY18 worth Rs42cr as part of the restructuring efforts.ITI is a manufacturer of electronic equipment that are used primarily in defence and telecommunications industries. The company is undergoing a revitalisation plan that was started in 2014. Under the governments revival plan, ITI would receive an infusion of Rs4,156cr. So far, Rs272cr have been disbursed for capital expenditure purposes. The company has recently submitted proposals for new projects worth Rs500cr and has allocated Rs200cr towards capex for FY18. The company has also begun the process of setting up equipment to manufacture Optical Fibre Cable (OCF).We expect the company to report revenue growth of 5% over FY17-20E on account of (a) growth in telecom equipment segment due to government schemes such as Bharat Net and (b) upgrading of existing defence equipment. EBITDA margin is expected to turn positive in FY19E because of improvement of the companys capabilities and better technology. The stock is currently trading at 19.3FY20E EPS.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: ITOrizon Inc partners with Ramco Systems to offer Next-Gen integrated supply chain solutions
Tags: ['Ramco Systems Ltd', 'Ramco Systems Ltd share price', 'Know more']
Subtitle: Ramco will leverage ITOrizon's managed services to bring its multi-industry supply chain platform to global enterprises
Content: ['Ramco Systems Ltd(Ramco), a global enterprise software company focusing on enterprise cloud platform, products and services, announced its partnership with ITOrizon Inc. ITOrizon is a Global Services Company specialized in Supply Chain Management, Enterprise Resource Planning, Enterprise Order Management and Digital Business. It is headquartered in Atlanta (USA) with consultants in Florida, New Jersey and Washington, along with offshore development centres in India (Bangalore & Chennai).ITOrizon, by using Ramco\'s platform, will extend its integrated supply chain management solutions for existing and new customers across five continents it serves. Ramco will leverage ITOrizon\'s managed services to bring its multi-industry supply chain platform to global enterprises. Ramco will continue to develop cutting-edge innovations in providing enterprise cloud solutions. This partnership will draw new insights from Ramco directly into the ITOrizon customer success platform."Ramco has been transforming the way supply chain and technology are leveraged within an enterprise. Our Logistics solution will not only help enterprises manage their business with ease but also swiftly respond to evolving imperatives of business, Harsh Vardhan G, Chief Marketing & Ecosystem Officer, Ramco Systems said in a filing to BSE.Ramco Systems Ltd is currently trading at Rs458.10 up by Rs12.2 or 2.74% from its previous closing of Rs445.90 on the BSE.\xa0The stock is currently trading below its 50 DMA.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Markets welcome the March F&O series on a positive note
Subtitle: Midcaps and Smallcaps are also in demand, while the India Vix has declined by 4.5%.
Content: ['Markets welcome the March F&O series on a positive note. All the sectoral indices are in the green. The Nifty Pharma index has led the upswing followed by PSU Bank index. 10,450-10,470 is crucial resistance zone for Nifty.Midcaps and Smallcaps are also in demand, while the India Vix has declined by 4.5%.At 9:20 AM, the Nifty 50 index was at 1,0421.20 points, up 38.50 points or 0.4%, while Sensex was at 33,942.40 points, up 122.90 points or 0.4%.Shares of pharmaceutical companies rose the most, led by gains in Aurobindo Pharma and Cadila Healthcare. Nifty Pharma index was up 1.4%.Shares of information technology companies also traded higher on positive outlook by NASSCOM.Shares of Federal Bank rose 3.3% today after its board approved buying 26% stake in financial services company Equirus Capital.Shares of Seamec rose 3% today on pact with Kreuz Subsea for supply of diesel.At global front, key Asian indices advanced today, mirroring the positive trend in the US markets. The Dow Jones Industrial Average and S&P 500 index snapped a two-session losing streak on Friday, led by gains in the shares of energy companies. However, Nasdaq composite fell for the third straight session on Friday.Sun Pharma (+2.64%), Tata Steel (+1.86%), TechM (+1.73%) and Auro Pharma (+1.64%) were the top gainers on Nifty50.Infratel (-0.84%), Asian Paints (-0.79%), M&M (-0.69%) and GAIL (-0.47%) were the top losers in todays trade.A total of 8 stocks registered a fresh 52-week high in trade today, while 12 stocks touched a new 52-week low on the NSE.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Dilip Buildcon has bagged road project worth Rs157cr from IRCON International Ltd

Content: ['Dilip Buildcon Ltdhas received a letter of award from lRCON lnternational Limited (Government of India Undertaking) for a new EPC project in the state of Karnataka. The project involves six laning of Davanagere-Haveri Section of NH-48, with a length of 6.85km. NHAI bid project cost was Rs148.28cr and the companys bid price was Rs157.23cr. Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: 10 stocks are witnessing big change in Put-call ratio as March series begins
Subtitle: Put/Call ratio is mainly used as a contrarian indicator. Markets in the short-term are driven more by emotions than fundamentals. Times of greed and fear in the market are reflected by the significantly low or high PCR.
Content: ['What is Put/Call Ratio?Put/Call ratio is a popular derivative indicator, specifically designed to help traders gauge the overall\xa0mood of the market. The ratio is calculated either on the basis of options trading volumes or on the basis of the open interest for a period. If the ratio is more than 1, it means that more puts have traded during the day and if it is less than 1, it means more calls have been traded.Lets see how PCR analysis can be interpreted taking option sellers into consideration, who are the major players in the market as compared to the retail public, who are usually on the buying side of the trade.Put / Call RatioInterpretationIf put call ratio increases as minor dips getting bought in during an up trending marketBullish Indication. It means the put writers are aggressively writing at dips expecting the uptrend to continueIf put call ratio decreases while markets are testing the resistance levelsBearish Indication. It means call writers expecting limited upside in the market or a correct and build a fresh position.If put call ratio decreases during down trending marketBearish indication. It means option writers are aggressively selling the call option strikes.Following is the list of stocks that are witnessing maximum change in their put-call ratio ahead of March F&O expiry.PCR Open InterestUnderlineCurrentPrevious% ChangeCUMMINSIND5.330.539.11GODREJIND2.880.298.83BALKRISIND3.700.476.90BALRAMCHIN1.800.295.18CONCOR2.400.434.55SREINFRA3.780.763.96BAJAJ-AUTO2.260.493.63ADANIPOWER1.080.243.60COLPAL0.830.222.86MFSL1.710.452.77PCR VolumeUnderlineCurrentPrevious% ChangeMFSL6.000.0877.00KAJARIACER3.670.0754.00CUMMINSIND5.000.2123.17BALKRISIND4.830.2220.59SREINFRA6.890.4215.45RAYMOND1.840.1312.79HEROMOTOCO1.300.1110.83BAJAJ-AUTO1.650.178.68GODREJIND1.500.178.00TATAELXSI0.740.097.21']

Author: ['Business Wire ']
Title: EarlySalary and Niki.ai Introduce New Shopping Chatbot with Pay-later Option
Subtitle: EarlySalary and Niki.ai Introduce New Shopping Chatbot with Pay-later Option
Content: ["Business Wire IndiaScreenshot of EarlySalary AppWill help its customers to carry out hassle-free transaction like booking cabs, plan travel or pay bills using EarlySalary credit & pay using pay-later or EMI optionAllows its customers to make instant bookings for movie tickets, travel tickets, hotels and pay their utility bills via a simpleconversational user interfaceWith Indias 1st FinTech Start-up EarlySalary, Ultra Short Term Loanson Mobile Apps are becoming a fast reality for Millennials and Gen ZEarlySalary is the only lender which helps young working professionals get access to credit without Credit Bureau history, boosting their financial confidenceEarlySalary, Indias first FinTech start-up to offer Instant Salary Advances & Short terms loanshas tied up withIndia's leading Artificial Intelligence firm Niki.ai, to offer its customers a simple and easy to use chatbot to shop for products and services whilst using the EMI option.EarlySalary and Niki.ai will help in simplifying the shopping experience by permitting the whole ordering process on chat itself. This collaboration will not only result in a hassle-free experience, but will also allow users to opt for thepay laterfacility while picking services like  mobile phone recharge, cab booking, utility bills, laundry, hotel bookings, making party bookings, etc. Moreover, this partnership will also eliminate the need for downloading multiple e-commerce apps by providing asmart one-stop-shopfor ones needs.Nikideveloped by a group of four IIT graduates, is an artificial intelligence based bot that works as a smart personal assistant. The user interface is quite simple and intuitive. The conversations between the user and bot are prompt and in real time which dont require any human intervention. This\xa0makes Niki the only fully automated bot to handle end-to-end transactions.Given the high rate of internet penetration, shopping apps are becoming a new-age trend in India. Besides, demonetization has led to an increase in the number of users shopping online and over two million young Indians are now buying products and services online. Also, as per a recent survey by Criteo - the performance marketing technology company, about 74 per cent of Indian mobile users have installed two to five shopping apps on their smartphones. The survey further divulged that about 80 percent of the online shoppers now find mobile shopping more secure. A conversational interface only makes it easier, since everyone is already habitual to using messaging apps today.Elaborating on this new partnershipAkshay Mehrotra, Co-Founder & CEO at EarlySalary commented, At EarlySalary, tech innovations have always been our chief focus. With this association, we are aiming to offer our customers convenience through simplifying their everyday lives by way of revolutionizing the entire online experience. We see a good benefit in using artificial intelligence for intuitive customer interaction & lending. At EarlySalary we aim to position ourselves as the first line of credit for the young working Indians, hence partnerships like these take us one step closer to this goal.Commenting on the partnership, Sachin Jaiswal, CEO at Niki.ai said,This partnership revolutionizes the shopping experience for Indian customers. They can now simply chat with Niki for various services like they do on a messaging app & pay later using EarlySalary credit. With a very simple SDK integration, all the 20+ commerce services of Niki are now available within the EarlySalary app environment. Moreover, the experience of transacting over simple conversations is ideal for the EarlySalary customer, would lead to an increase in customer satisfaction, repeats, retention, and increased revenues for our partner. This is just a beginning of the partnership for the 2 AI firms, and we hope to create a much bigger success story with EarlySalary in the time to come.EarlySalary as a company has always tried to use technology in a way that helps in providing the best possible experience to its customers.About EarlySalary.comFounded by Akshay Mehrotra and Ashish Goyal, EarlySalary is a\xa0mobile app which allows salaried individuals to avail instant loansfor an average tenure of 30 days or till the next salary cycle.\xa0These loans are similar to salary advances or credit card cash withdrawals, empowering consumers with ready cash when it is most needed.\xa0The company conducts prudent risk assessment by leveraging social profiling to go beyond financial underwriting and IndiaStack.Initially operating in 8 metros, EarlySalary is now catering to working professionals in 15 cities across India and seen over 1.4 million customer downloads. The company has been working on introducing multiple products, line of credit functionality, EMIs and other products focused towards helping young working professions with credit needs.Key FeaturesInstant Salary Advance up to 50% of monthly Salary in less than 10 minutesSuper fast: 70% loans are granted in less than 10 minutesInstant Cash: Salary advance/cash loans transferred to bank anytime instantlyShort duration: Cash loans from 7 days up to 30 daysInstant Transactions: From Rs. 8,000 to Rs. 1 Lac cash transferred to the customers bank accountShop now and pay later - ability to use the loan limit to shop online on creditAbout the Senior ManagementAkshay Mehrotra, CEO: Previously served as the Chief Marketing Officer at Big Bazaar, Future Retail Limited. Also worked as CMO at PolicyBazaar.com and Marketing Head at Bajaj Allianz Life Insurance.Ashish Goyal, CFO: A chartered accountant by education and previously served as the Chief Investment Officer at Bajaj Allianz General Insurance.Vimal Saboo, CBO: Previously served as the Business Head of Edelweiss Capital and also served in senior roles at Axis Bank.Vivek Jain, CTO: Previously served as the Principal Technology Architect at Infosys.For more information please visitwww.earlysalary.comLike us on Facebook:fb.com/EarlySalaryFollow us on Twitter:twitter.com/early_salaryAbout Niki.aiThe company provides a simple and easy to use chat interface to shop for numerous products and services like movie and bus ticket booking, hotel and cab booking, utility bill payments, mobile recharges, local deals and laundry service, to name a few. To the businesses, it provides a plug and play technology in the form of Niki SDK that can be easily integrated everywhere including operating systems, on messaging platforms like Facebook Messenger, and on the brands applications (app and web).Started in 2015, and backed by Mr. Ratan Tata, Unilazer Ventures and SAP.iO among other investors, Niki.ai envisions to provide one shop for everything commerce. Niki makes the whole journey from discovery to transaction fast, convenient and extremely simple. With a 55% month-on-month revenue growth, the company has 50+ partners on board, with many more in the pipeline.For more information please visithttps://resellers.niki.aiLike us on Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/talktonikiFollow us on Twitter:https://twitter.com/talktoniki"]

Author: ['Business Wire ']
Title: Controversial Economist Predicts that India Could Dethrone Western Wealth and Power
Subtitle: Controversial Economist Predicts that India Could Dethrone Western Wealth and Power
Content: ["Business Wire IndiaDr. Marc Faber speaking at The Equitymaster Conference 2018 in the Taj Mahal Palace Hotel, MumbaiOutspoken economist, Dr. Marc Faber, was at The Taj Mahal Palace Hotel on Saturday.Dr. Faber, whos also the editor of The Gloom, Boom and Doom Report, was the keynote speaker atEquitymasters 5th annual investor conference.Equitymasteris a financial research publisher based in Nariman Point, Mumbai.Over dozens of charts, Dr. Faber showed that while growth in the West is slowing, Asia is growing at a tremendous rate.Dr. Faber is nicknamed Dr. Doom for his contrarian and bearish predictions. He warned clients to cash out before the Black Monday stock market crash in 1987, and helped clients profit handsomely as the Japanese stock bubble burst.But hes been a longtime Asia bull, and wrote an Amazon bestselling book predicting the continents rise, titled Tomorrows Gold: Asias Age of Discovery.Dr. Faber first came to India way back in 1973, but at the time it was difficult for a foreigner to invest in India. Thats changed now and hes taking advantage.During his presentation, Dr. Faber said the end of Western economic and political hegemony is coming, and Asias rise to the top is virtually unstoppable.We live in a new world, Dr. Faber said.Buthow should individuals investin this new world?Dr. Faberrecommends Indian stocks,real estate, bonds and commodities (with an emphasis on precious metals). Over the long run, they should all do very well.Specifically, Dr. Faber said hed wait for thecurrent correction in Indian stocks to take its course, before investing. He particularly likes financial service stocks.Dr. Faber offered two caveats to his predictionFirst isIndias growing and bureaucratic government. Dr. Faber said that government is a cancer, the smaller it is the better. He does, however, think the RBI is doing a wonderful job as a steward for the Indian economy, which is rare among central banks.Second, Indias rise depends on peace and stability in the region. The USA, who wont cede dominance easily, could play the role of troublemaker in the east. The USA has tens of thousands of troops spread around Asia.If both these threats can be avoided, India has the healthiest demographics in the world, and the long-term future of the country is incredibly prosperous.About Dr. Marc FaberDr. Faber is a Swiss investor, publisher of the Gloom Boom & Doom Report newsletter, and the director of Marc Faber Ltd, which acts as an investment advisor and fund manager. Dr. Faber earned his PhD in Economics from the University of Zurich, and has worked as an investment advisor for nearly 30 years. In 2002, he wrote the Amazon bestsellerTomorrows Gold: Asias Age of Discovery,in which he predicted the economic rise of India, China, and the rest of the continent.About EquitymasterSince 1996, Equitymaster has beenthesource for honest and credible opinions on theIndian stock markets. With solid research and in-depth analysis Equitymaster is dedicated towards making its readers- smarter, more confident and richer every day. Here's why hundreds of thousands of readers spread across more than 70 countriesTrust Equitymaster."]

Author: ['Business Wire ']
Title: Mount Elbert, GIC and OPTrust Form EdgeCore Internet Real Estate
Subtitle: Mount Elbert, GIC and OPTrust Form EdgeCore Internet Real Estate
Content: ['Business Wire IndiaMount Elbert Capital Partners (Mount Elbert), GIC and OPTrust today announced the formation of EdgeCore Internet Real Estate, LLC (the Company), an investment vehicle with fully integrated operational capabilities formed to develop, acquire, and operate data centers across North America. The Company will initially be capitalized with over US$800 million of equity targeted to support approximately US$2.0 billion in data center development and investment.This press release features multimedia. View the full release here:http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180214005255/en/EdgeCore Internet Real Estates initial roll out of its North American data center platform will include campus developments across six markets. The Company has acquired land in Mesa, Arizona, and prior to the end of this quarter the company plans to close upon existing agreements to acquire land in Dallas and Reno. The Company plans to commence construction on each campus immediately upon acquisition. With each campus designed to deliver between 100 MW and 200 MW of critical power to customers, the Company plans to complete the first building in these markets in late 2018. Additionally, in the second quarter of this year the Company intends to pursue acquiring land in three complementary Tier I markets, with a view toward commencing construction on each campus within the year.We are pleased and honored to join forces with GIC and OPTrust, which we view as two of the worlds most capable and sophisticated investors. We are excited to execute upon our shared vision of creating a scalable North American data center platform and we look forward to expanding with GIC and OPTrust as we work to grow EdgeCore Internet Real Estate beyond our initial roll out, says Tom Ray, Chairman and CEO of EdgeCore Internet Real Estate and Mount Elbert.GIC will be the lead anchor investor in EdgeCore Internet Real Estate. Lee Kok Sun, Chief Investment Officer, GIC Real Estate, said, GIC is pleased to partner with Mount Elbert and OPTrust in this venture. As a long-term value investor, we believe the secular growth in data consumption and public cloud usage will generate attractive returns in the data center sector.This press release does not constitute an offer to sell, or a solicitation of an offer to buy, any securities.Additional information on the Company can be found atwww.edgecore.com.About Mount ElbertMount Elbert Capital Partners is a private investment company and SEC-registered Investment Advisor headquartered in Denver, Colorado, with specialized capabilities in real assets, including data centers and related infrastructure. Founders of Mount Elbert have experience evaluating, making and managing investments in real assets with an aggregate value exceeding $10 billion across the US, Europe, and Asia, with more than $5.0 billion in data center real estate and related infrastructure.About GICGIC is a leading global investment firm with well over US$100 billion in assets under management. Established in 1981 to secure the financial future of Singapore, the firm manages Singapores foreign reserves. A disciplined long-term value investor, GIC is uniquely positioned for investments across a wide range of asset classes, including real estate, private equity, equities and fixed income. GIC has investments in over 40 countries and has been investing in emerging markets for more than two decades. Headquartered in Singapore, GIC employs over 1,400 people across 10 offices in key financial cities worldwide. For more information about GIC, please visitwww.gic.com.sg.About OPTrustA fully funded plan with net assets of $19 billion as of December 31, 2016, OPTrust invests and manages one of Canadas largest pension funds and administers the OPSEU Pension Plan, a defined benefit plan with almost 90,000 members and retirees.OPTrust is a global investor in a broad range of asset classes including Canadian and foreign equities, fixed income, real estate, infrastructure and private markets, and has a team of highly experienced investment professionals located in Toronto, London and Sydney. As a pension management organization, OPTrusts mission is to pay pensions today, preserve pensions for tomorrow.View source version on businesswire.com:http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180214005255/en/MULTIMEDIA AVAILABLE :http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180214005255/en/']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: US indices end higher Wed despite strong Jan inflation
Subtitle: The strength in the stocks came as investors have factored in an economic scenario with higher inflation and a quicker pace of tightening of US monetary policy, following the recent sell-off in equities.
Content: ['Benchmark equity indices in the US recovered from the early session weakness to end firmly higher for the fourth straight session on Wednesday, as investors shrugged off the stronger-than-expected January inflation data and a spike in bond yields.The strength in the stocks came as investors have factored in an economic scenario with higher inflation and a quicker pace of tightening of US monetary policy, following the recent sell-off in equities, reports said.US indices moved lower in the early session after a report from the Labour Department showed that Jan CPI climbed by 0.5% after edging up by a revised 0.2% in December, and higher than consensus estimate of 0.3%.However, a separate report from the Commerce Department showed an unexpected decrease in retail sales in January.Dow Jones closed at 24893.40 up 1.03%, S&P 500 ended at 2698.63 up 1.34% and NASDAQ closed at 7143.61 up 1.86%.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: eClerx Services buyback to open on February 22, 2018
Subtitle: Buyback opens on February 22, 2018
Content: ['eClerx Services Limited has intimated to the exchanges that the buy-back of 0.129cr shares will open on February 22, 2018 and will close on March 8, 2018. The company had earlier communicated about boards approval of the buy-back at price not exceeding Rs2,000per equity share, aggregating up to an amount not exceeding Rs258cr. The total buy-back size is 3.24% of total paid up equity capital of the company. The record date for the buy-back was set at February 5, 2018.The buy-back will involve allocation of 15% of the outlay to Small Shareholders, defined as shareholders with not more than holding value of Rs2lakhs on the record date. The reservation for the Small Shareholders, will be 193,500 equity shares, while that of the General category will be 1,096,500 equity shares. The entitlement ratio works out to 6 equity shares out of every 47 fully paid-up equity shares held on the record date for the Small Shareholders category. The same for the General category is 6 for every 211 fully paid up equity shares held on record date.eClerx Services, a business services provider, is expected to witness some recovery in revenue growth with stability returning in top-client accounts. The revenue growth was hampered on account of rolling-off of projects by top clients. The revenue growth is also expected to be supported by improving demand environment as well better deal pipeline. Profitability is estimated to\xa0be better\xa0with improvement in revenue growth rates.The company last commenced its buy-back of 0.117cr shares (2.86% of equity) on October 26,\xa02016 at the same price. We believe that the Smaller Shareholders, holding less than 139 equity shares, can benefit to some extent by tendering the shares in the offer. The stock has already corrected by ~13% from the ex-date price and tendering of 17 shares at Rs2,000/share is an attracte proposition.Post\xa0the buy-back, we expect the FY20E EPS to enhance from ~Rs98 per share to ~Rs101 per share and the stock is available at 13.5x its FY20E EPS. We believe that with bottoming out of concerns and improving earnings visibility, the company should command 15x multiple on the safe side and one can expect the stock to rebound to Rs1,500 level. Hence, we recommend to tender the shares in the offer, while buying the tendered quantity from the open market.']

Author: ['Business Wire ']
Title: WTO Chief, Malcolm Gladwell and Visionaries Close World Government Summit 2018 With Future Forecasts
Subtitle: WTO Chief, Malcolm Gladwell and Visionaries Close World Government Summit 2018 With Future Forecasts
Content: ["Business Wire IndiaThe sixth edition of theWorld Government Summit (WGS 2018)ended in Dubai with invigorating talks highlighting the seismic and inevitable changes innovation will bring, and a plea for institutions to realign with the new world order.This press release features multimedia. View the full release here:http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180213006279/en/HE Roberto Carvalho de Azevêdo, Director-General of the World Trade Organization (WTO), speaking at the sixth edition of the World Government Summit (WGS 2018) in Dubai, at a session titled: 'The Outlook for Global Trade in a Hyperconnected World', moderated by CNN's Emerging Markets Editor John Defterios (Photo: AETOSWire)Eight out of 10 jobs that are lost in advanced economies are lost to new technology - not to trade or to immigrants, said World Trade Organization Director-General Roberto Carvalho de Azevêdo. E-commerce is a reality. It is important for the 164 member countries to join the discussion about it, although not all of them are prepared to.He continued: A lot of the e-commerce that we see today is business-to-business. Business-to-consumer changes the world completely. The laws and regulations of consumer protection have to be thought about, cross-border transactions, digital signatures, the legality of contracts across the border, which legislation applies, return of merchandise  its a world out there.Champions of cryptocurrencies dismissed suggestions of a bitcoin bubble, emphasizing that digital assets are here to stay. Cryptocurrency is the peoples currency of monetary independence, it is much more than a financial currency. Bitcoin is not a bubble, it is the pin that is popping the bubble of the legacy financial systems since it has been created, said Blockchain Technologies Corporations founder and CEO Nick Spanos.Best-selling author Malcolm Gladwell remarked that societies are evolving because of technology, and in this context, governments need to prepare for future uncertainties. He underscored the importance of humans judgment in shaping a more humane future.Gladwell also highlighted the challenges facing governments and institutions in an era of surplus information. The expectations we have from governments have remained in place for 200 years. The challenges facing governments are changing in the modern world. Shifts in expectations need governments to develop progressive policies that can accommodate the global transition towards a knowledge-based economy, he said.*Source:AETOSWireView source version on businesswire.com:http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180213006279/en/MULTIMEDIA AVAILABLE :http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180213006279/en/"]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Top concept cars that grabbed eyeballs at Auto Expo 2018
Subtitle: Most concept vehicles were electric variants by companies that are planning to launch depending on the response generated.
Content: ['The grandest Automobile show of the year, Auto Expo 2018, unveiled a flurry of new vehicles, product refreshes and concept vehicles. Concept vehicles attracted quite a few eyeballs due to their unique looks and new fuel type (electric, hybrid). Following are some concept vehicles that generated interest in this years event:Maruti Suzuki e-Survivor Maruti Suzukis first electric vehicle for the Indian market to be launched in CY2020. A compact SUV that will be equipped with autonomous driving capabilities and connected solutions.Maruti Suzuki Future S A crossover (between a hatchback and SUV), which is smaller than its SUV Vitara Brezza. Expected to hit market in about two years. Will compete with M&Ms KUV100 and Renault Kwid.Mahindra TUV Stinger concept Based on M&Ms TUV 300 and mHawk family. The vehicle is a convertible SUV and delivers 140bhp and 320Nm of torque.Tata H5X concept Based on Land Rovers OMEGA platform and suited for Indian road conditions. It is a compact SUV that will be launched in India in CY2019 and will be competitor to Hyundai Creta.Tata 45X concept Premium hatchback with futuristic looks, based on European design. Launch expected in CY2019. It will be a competitor to Maruti Suzuki Baleno and Hyundai Elite i20.Kia SP Concept The vehicle will mark the South Korean car makers foray in India. The SP concept is a compact SUV. Launch expected in H2CY19.Mahindra Udo concept Compact two seater electric mobility pod. It has smart fitness feature, which allows driver to pedal the car if it runs out of power. The system recharges batteries when the driver pedals.Renault Zoe concept An electric hatchback, based on Renault-Nissan-Mitsubishi alliances B platform.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: PNB slips more than 9% on account of reported fraudulent transactions
Subtitle: Punjab National Bank extended its losses and tanked more than 9% as investors fear the bank may have to take a one-time write-off for the $1,771.69mn (~Rs11,378.68cr) fraud in Q4FY18.
Content: ["Punjab National Bankextended its losses and tanked more than 9% as investors fear the bank may have to take a one-time write-off for the $1,771.69mn (~Rs11,378.68cr) fraud in Q4FY18.The market capitalization of the bank as on February 12, 2018, was Rs39,209.62cr. The fraud transaction is close to one-third of the market cap of the bank.The banking secretary commented that the government may order a forensic audit of PNB's accounts, as per the media reports. Also, the banks ten employees have been suspended and that CBI has started its investigation in the case.The CBI has also received two complaints from PNB against jewellery designer Nirav Modi and a jewellery company about fraudulent transactions, as per the media sources.The fraud and unauthorized transactions have been executed for the benefit of a few select account holders with their apparent connivance. Based on these transactions, other banks appear to have advanced money to these customers abroad.According to the bank, these transactions are contingent in nature and liability arising out of it shall be decided based on the law and genuineness of underlying transactions. The bank has referred this matter to law enforcement agencies to examine and book the culprits as per law of the land.The stock ended at Rs145.8, down by Rs15.85 or 9.81% from its previous closing of Rs161.65 on the BSE."]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: PSU Bank stocks drag the market lower
Subtitle: Bank Nifty ended the day down 1.4%.
Content: ['Markets traded in a narrow range before witnessing heavy selling pressure in the final hour of trade.The fraud detected in PNB Bank, as well as the new NPA rules stipulated by the RBI, weighed in on Bank Nifty, which ended the day down 1.4%. Most of the PSU Bank stocks closed ~5-8% lower with PNB closing 9.77% lower. The Mid Cap index outperformed, managing to end the day marginally in the green. Market breadth ended in the favor of decline with Advance-Decline ratio closing at 1:1x.Nifty February futures and Bank Nifty February futures witnessed a surge in open interest to the tune of ~4.27 lakh shares and 3.09 lakh shares respectively, mainly short positions.Tracking the Nifty options, 10600CE and 10500CE saw an addition in open interest to the tune of ~9.82 lakh shares and ~4.09 lakh shares respectively, indicating fresh short positions, while the 10500PE option strike witnessed a surge in open interest to the tune of 5.73 lakh shares indicating long build up.India VIX index closed 3.89% lower ending at 17.18.Nifty:-38 points @ 10500Bank Nifty:-360 points @ 25341Top 2 F&O Gainer:DEWAN HOUSING ,RCOMTop 2 F&O Loser:PNB,BANK OF INDIAMost Active Index Option Contract:Call Option:10600CE, O.I: +~9.82 lakh sharesPut Option:10500PE, O.I: + ~5.73 lakh sharesNifty Max O.I Strikes:11100CE, 10500PEBank Nifty Max O.I Strikes:26000CE, 25000PE (15THFeb 2018 Expiry)']

Author: ['Business Wire ']
Title: Iraq's Re-building Opportunities Involving Diversification Initiatives across Multiple Sectors Make it an Attractive Investment Destination Globally
Subtitle: Iraq's Re-building Opportunities Involving Diversification Initiatives across Multiple Sectors Make it an Attractive Investment Destination Globally
Content: ["Business Wire IndiaBridged between Asia, Middle East and African economies and strategically placed at the mouth of Europe, Iraq possesses immense locational advantage as a nation with opportunities that stand to be untapped. The country benefits from immense natural wealth in the form of its huge reserves of natural resources. Having been brutally battered first by the Gulf war and more recently by the ISIS conflict, Iraq is just emerging from the destruction and strategizing the rebuilding of the country to position itself as a regional super power.Even as the nations re-building opportunity proves to be humungous and unique, investors and businesses alike are in need of business intelligence in understanding the right mode of entry, the most rewarding business model and business opportunity. Iraq possesses one of the largest oil reserves in the world making it a highly attractive business opportunity. As the country also focuses on diversification initiatives, opportunities unfurl in sectors such as construction, infrastructure, healthcare, transportation, energy and telecom which are being positioned as high priority development sectors.Frost & Sullivans recent research report on Assessment of Industry Sector Opportunities in Iraq provides a broad overview of the current status of these high priority sectors, apart from providing a brief peek into addressable opportunity areas.To access more information on this analysis, please clickhereor write to us atpriyag@frost.com.Ali Mirmohammad, Senior Consultant - Iraq, Frost & Sullivan said, With the end of the ISIS war, Iraq is on the path of reconstruction and economic resurrection that calls for sustained investment to the tune of over USD 900 billion within the next decade. Iraq plans to focus on the Oil & Gas downstream value chain as well as minerals value chain, construction and infrastructure industries, healthcare, energy, tourism and financial services sectors to move the GDP growth rate by 10% annually within the next decade.Following the ISIS war, multiple sectors are in a state of disarray and would need massive re-development and newer investments. Oil & gas, housing, infrastructure, industry, minerals, and service sectors would account for 65% of the overall investment in the next 10 years, while ICT, transportation healthcare, water, electricity, tourism and renewable energy would account for the remaining 35% investment in Iraq in the next 10 years.The country requires overUSD 30 billionper annum of foreign direct investment (FDI) to achieve its reformation and stabilisation goals within the next 10 years, noted Ali. With39+ million population, Iraq remains an attractive consumer market with potential of overUSD 40 billion.About Frost & SullivanFrost & Sullivan, the Growth Partnership Company, works in collaboration with clients to leverage visionary innovation that addresses the global challenges and related growth opportunities that will make or break today's market participants. For more than 50 years, we have been developing growth strategies for the global 1000, emerging businesses, the public sector and the investment community.Contact us: Start the discussionWebsite:http://ww2.frost.comTwitter:@Frost_Sullivan&@Frost_MENASAFacebook:http://www.facebook.com/frostandsullivanLinkedIn:https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/frost-&-sullivan-%E2%80%93-middle-east-north-africa-south-asia/"]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Most Asian indices end on a higher note ahead of inflation data in US
Subtitle: Japan's Nikkei 225 index ended lower on appreciation of the yen against the US dollar, which hurt shares of export-oriented companies on the exchange.
Content: ["Most benchmark indices in Asia ended higher tracking positive overnight cues from US equities and ahead of a crucial inflation data in the US.Asian equities had seen sharp sell-off last week on concerns of a resurgence in global inflation, which may result in tightening of monetary policies by global central banks.Japan's Nikkei 225 index ended lower on appreciation of the yen against the US dollar, which hurt shares of export-oriented companies on the exchange.Hong Kong's Hang Seng ended the day up 2.27% at 30,515.60, while\xa0South Korea's Kospi ended at 2,421.83, up 1.11%, China's Shanghai Composite at 31,55.02, up 0.80%, and Taiwan's Taiex ended the day up 0.48% at 10,421.09.On the other hand,\xa0Singapore's Straits Times edned the day down marginally at 3,405.15, while Japan's Nikkei 225 was down 0.43% at 21,154.17."]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: European indices gain on positive cues from Asian markets
Subtitle: Gains were capped by caution among investors ahead of inflation data in the US to be released later today.
Content: ["Benchmark indices in Europe rose tracking gains in Asian equity markets and US equities overnight.However, gains were capped by caution among investors ahead of inflation data in the US to be released later today.Germany's DAX Performance Index rose nearly 1% after the country saw its economy expand by 0.6% in Oct-Dec, in line with analysts' estimate.At the time of filing, Germany's DAX was up 0.61% at 12,271.77, and UK's FTSE 100 was up 0.48% at 7,202.88, while France's CAC-40 traded at 5,130.08."]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: BHEL bags Rs560cr order from NTPC
Subtitle: BHEL has announced receipt of an order for emission control equipment from NTPC.
Content: ['Bharat Heavy Electricals Ltd. (BHEL)announced that it has won a Rs560cr order for emission control equipment from NTPC. The scope of the order includes supply and installation of the Flue Gas Desulphurization (FGD) system at its 2x490MW National Capital Power Station (NCPS) at Dadri in Uttar Pradesh.The order is of great significance to BHEL as the Indian power sector is moving towards stricter emission norms notified in December 2015. The notification calls for installation of equipment to control various harmful emissions, both in existing as well as new thermal power projects. This has led to an increase in ordering of emission control equipments.BHELs order backlog currently stands at ~Rs1,02,200cr. During 9MFY18, the company bagged orders of ~Rs15,774cr']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Sensex falls over 200 points; PNB stock down 9%
Subtitle: Equity benchmarks trading lower after sharp fall in PSU Bank Index.
Content: ["Benchmark indices remained volatile in the afternoon, but the broader markets continued to outperform.On BSE Sensex, Unitech was the volume topper with a TTQ of 3,948,039, followed by GVK Power And Infrastructure, Syndicate Bank and Firstsource Solutions.PSU Banking sector declined heavily by 2.8% led by Punjab National Bank. Bank of India and Oriental bank plummeted more than 5%.At 3:25 PM, the BSE Sensex was trading at 34,037, down 263 points, while the Nifty50 index was trading at 10,471, down 68\xa0 points.The CBI has received two complaints from PNB against billionaire jewellery designer Nirav Modi and a jewellery company about fraudulent transactions worth Rs10,000cr, as per media reports. Shares on PNB fell over 7.5%.Sunteck Realty shares rallied over 4.5% after the companys Q3 profit jumped by 238% to Rs602cr and its revenue increased by 141% to Rs2,105cr compared to year-ago.NCC shares gained over 4.5% after the company's Q3 net profit jumped 72% to Rs100cr on strong operational performance.The BSE MidCap Index gained 0.75% and the BSE SmallCap Index gained 0.79%.Volatility index India VIX slipped 6.01% at 16.8075.Indiabulls Housing Finance (+3.3%), Bajaj Finance (+2.8%), Coal India (+2.6%), Tech Mahindra (+2.5%) and Wipro (+2.5%) were the top gainers on Nifty50.Bharti Infratel (-3.3%), Axis Bank (-2.9%), Yes Bank (-2.3%), State Bank of India (-2.2%) and Power grid Corporation of India (-1.7%) were the top losers in todays trade.Out of 2017 stocks traded on Nifty, 1004 advanced, 682 declined and 331 remained unchanged.A total of 30 stocks registered a fresh 52-week high in trade today, while 7 stocks touched a new 52-week low on the NSE."]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Crude oil prices edges lower
Subtitle: Crude oil prices have broken the intermediate support of 3,775.
Content: ['Crude oil prices have broken the intermediate support of 3,775 and it is looking weak. Next suppot level can be seen near 3,750 levels.Close below 3,750 will be negative for prices and it could drift towards 3,650 levels or else close above 3,820 can push prices higher towards 3,880 levels.Crude oil inventory data is expected to be released today. Traders will be waiting for the data for cues, which would help to identify further trend.']

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Gold hovers near resistance levels
Subtitle: Next intermediate resistance can be seen near 30,370 levels.
Content: ["In today's trade, gold gave a gap up opening above the major resistance level of 30,250 levels due to a weakness in dollar index. In yesterday's session, volatility was witnessed in bullions as the dollar index slipped below the major support level of $90.Next intermediate resistance can be seen near 30,370 levels. Daily close above 30,370 can push prices higher towards 30,560 levels. If prices slip below 30,250, then it can retrace back to 30,100 ."]

Author: ['India Infoline News Service ']
Title: Punjab National Bank reports fraud of US $1,771.69mn, stock drops 9%
Subtitle: The fraud and unauthorized transactions have been executed for the benefit of a few select account holders with their apparent connivance.
Content: ['Punjab National Bank, through its filing on BSE, has informed that it has detected some fraudulent and unauthorized transactions in one of its branch in Mumbai. The cumulative fraud amounts to US $1,771.69mn i.e. Rs11,378.68cr.The fraud and unauthorized transactions have been executed for the benefit of a few select account holders with their apparent connivance. Based on these transactions, other banks appear to have advanced money to these customers abroad.According to the bank, these transactions are contingent in nature and liability arising out of it shall be decided based on the law and genuineness of underlying transactions. The bank has referred this matter to law enforcement agencies to examine and book the culprits as per law of the land.The stock\xa0is currently trading at Rs146.7, down by Rs14.95 or 9.25% from its previous closing of Rs161.65 on the BSE.']

Author: ['Business Wire ']
Title: OnePlus becomes the Market Leader in the Fast-growing Premium Android Smartphone Segment in India
Subtitle: OnePlus becomes the Market Leader in the Fast-growing Premium Android Smartphone Segment in India
Content: ['Business Wire IndiaOnePlus, a global mobile technology company, continued its growth in the overall Indian premium Android smartphone segment (above $400) by capturing 48% market share in Q4 2017, as per International Data Corporations (IDC) latest Quarterly Mobile Phone Tracker Q4 2017.The IDC data also highlights the growing importance of the Premium Android smartphone segment that outperformed the overall smartphone market with 97% YOY growth (vs 54% for overall premium smartphone market and 14% for the overall smartphone market). During 2017, OnePlus grew by a staggering 1116% in the premium smartphone segment as it further strengthened its robust performance in the online market and entrenched itself in the minds of smartphone users in India by consistently staying ahead of the players like Apple and Samsung.According to the Counterpoint Research report for the last quarter on the Indian handset market, the premium smartphone segment was the second fastest growing segment (+20% YoY) in CY 2017 driven by the strong performance of OnePlus and Apple.Talking about the findings from the Q4 2017 report, Tarun Pathak, Associate Director, Counterpoint Research, said, While Indias smartphone market continues to grow in double digits, the premium segment (> INR 30,000) is all set to grow faster (+20%) than the overall smartphone market in CY 2018. In such a scenario brand like OnePlus, the fastest growing brand in this segment, is likely to grow as it enjoys a strong brand loyalty in India while positioning itself as a flagship-killer in the segment.Vikas Agarwal, General Manager at OnePlus, said, It is truly remarkable that OnePlus has become the biggest Android premium smartphone brand within just 3 years of entering the Indian market. It is a great validation of our user focused approach and online first business model. We are truly humbled and grateful to our business partners and loving community for their continued support.Globally, OnePlus became a $1.4 bn brand in the 4th year of its operation with India as its biggest market, contributing to one-third of the global business. With a single flagship a year product strategy and limited availability (Amazon.in for online and Croma for offline), OnePlus has emerged as the biggest brand in premium Android smartphone segment within just 3 years of its operations in India.With industry leading features like 8GB RAM, Dash charging and latest Android Oreo based OxygenOS, the attractively priced OnePlus 5T has become the best-selling premium smartphone with a average product rating of 4.6 which is the highest rating for any smartphone on Amazon.in as of Feb 22, 2018. The recently launched OnePlus 5T Lava Red edition was one of the most popular product on Amazon.in as it was quickly sold out during their flagship Republic Day and Valentine Day sale events.To further enhance the user experience and complement its online only presence, OnePlus has recently expanded its offline footprint with the launch of its first authorised store in Mumbai. OnePlus has also partnered with Croma to increase the no. of physical touchpoints and is in the process of opening large format exclusive experience stores across top citiesAbout OnePlusOnePlus is a global mobile technology company challenging conventional concepts of technology. Created around the Never Settle mantra, OnePlus creates exquisitely designed devices with premium build quality and high-performance hardware. OnePlus thrives on cultivating strong bonds and growing together with its community of users and fans.For more information, please visitoneplusstore.in']

Author: ['Business Wire ']
Title: Bitcoin Miner HashGains' Crowdsale to Build Green Cloud Mining Data Centers Receives Excellent Response
Subtitle: Bitcoin Miner HashGains' Crowdsale to Build Green Cloud Mining Data Centers Receives Excellent Response
Content: ['Business Wire IndiaHashGains.com, a leading cryptocurrency mining platform has launched its crowd sale program to build mega cryptocurrency cloud mining data centers in India and Canada which uses renewable energy like wind and solar as source of energy.With the growing worries around bitcoin mining causing environmental damage, difficulty levels of mining increasing and returns heading southwards, there was no better opportunity but to build green energy data centers which runs on free source of energy like wind and solar ensuring handsome mining rewards while taking care of environment said Mr Anuj Bairathi CEO, HashGains who is crypto enthusiast himself.HashGains is growing cloud mining platform with more than 10,000 active customers enjoying mining returns and is expected to reach the mark of 1 million customers by 2020. To handle such a massive growth and ever growing demand of customers it becomes even more important that mega mining centers are planned which can serve needs of huge customer base. India & Canada has the best potential for solar and wind energy and building cloud mining data centers ensures best return on investment.HashGains is venture of US-based Futuristic Internet Services LLC promoted by IT majorCyfuturewhich has experience of over 15 years with cloud data centers, managing more than 25,000 customers including 10 of Fortune 500 customers.The current crowd sale or initial coin offering of HashGains (HGS Tokens) aims at raising capital of US$30 Million for building two mega data centers and buying mining machines. Profits generated from these data centers is planned for distribution to its token holders in form of dividends.HashGains claims that its token sale program is highly rewarding and offers multiple advantages to prospective investors including high growth, free hash power, dividends, interconvertibility, discounts in buying mining plans and investment security which is automatically assured by proven profitability model of company.HashGains ICOspre-sale program which ends on 28thFeb has got excellent response from investors as the token originally priced at US$1 is available at US$0.53 only with discounts and bonus bundled in. During the main sale which starts in March company plans to offer discount of 20% on token price and bonus between 20-40%.Communityhttps://facebook.com/hashgainshttps://t.me/hashgainsYoutube.com/HashGains']

Author: ['Business Wire ']
Title: Ferring Pharmaceuticals and MSD Announce Completion of Largest Clinical Trial Ever Conducted in Postpartum Haemorrhage
Subtitle: Ferring Pharmaceuticals and MSD Announce Completion of Largest Clinical Trial Ever Conducted in Postpartum Haemorrhage
Content: ["Business Wire IndiaExcessive bleeding after childbirth (postpartum haemorrhage or PPH) is the leading direct cause of maternal mortality worldwide1The CHAMPION trial is assessing the effectiveness and safety of heat-stable carbetocin vs. oxytocin, the current standard of care, for preventing PPH after vaginal birth2,3\u200bFerring Pharmaceuticals and MSD, known as Merck & Co., Inc., Kenilworth, N.J., U.S.A., through itsMSD for Mothersinitiative, today announced the completion of CHAMPION (CarbetocinHaemorrhagePrevention), a global clinical trial conducted by the Human Reproduction Program (HRP) at the World Health Organization (WHO). CHAMPION is investigating whether Ferrings proprietary and heat-stable carbetocin could offer a new solution to prevent excessive bleeding after childbirth (postpartum haemorrhage or PPH).2,3Involving nearly 30,000 women in 10 countries, it is the largest clinical trial ever conducted in PPH.2,3This press release features multimedia.
